name: Lucinda ankle boots
description:
A striking flash of gold on Charlotte Olympia’s signature platform makes these Lucinda boots a statement-making choice. Crafted from luxurious suede and featuring the label’s signature spider web zipper, this pair makes a dramatic finishing touch to girly minis.  
These black suede ankle boots have an almond toe and a back heel zip fastening with a signature gold metal spider web zipper. 
The boots have a high stiletto heel and a metallic gold leather island platform. 
The shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, leather.

name: Meets Patternity Aran giant dot knit sweater
description:
Knitwear experts Chinti and Parker team up with pattern visionaries Patternity, and this Aran sweater showcases each of the duo’s unique talents. Giant circles are knitted into this oversized wool style effortlessly combining graphic motifs with understated cool. Pair yours with tailored trousers for days in the city. 
This navy sweater has contrasting knit giant spots, a round-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed-knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs.
100% merino wool.
Hand wash.

name: Seam detail dress
description:
Precision cut to a sleek silhouette, this ivory dress perfects Cédric Charlier’s contemporary minimalism. Perfect the monochrome look and team it with black accessories. 
This ivory sleeveless dress has a deep V-neck and a contoured seam panel detailing with a concealed centre back zip fastening.
88% polyester, 12% polyurethane.
Dry clean.

name: Allure swing dress
description:
Masters of all things beachwear, Zimmermann keep covering up in the sun a delight with this Allure swing dress. Bold floral-print and a relaxed silhouette make for a fabulous piece that will take you seamlessly from beach to bar. Throw yours on over a bikini for instant boho-luxe. 
This white and blue floral-print cotton cover-up dress has a scoop-neck, balloon sleeves and a gathered waistband with a pleated full skirt.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Quilted leather shoulder bag
description:
Bring a luxe Parisian accent to all your elegant evening ensembles with this Chanel Vintage quilted shoulder bag. A signature house design with a metal chain strap and gold C clasp. 
This vintage piece has been carefully sourced, any imperfections it may feature only add to the overall character and appeal.
This black quilted leather bag has a gold metal chain and leather shoulder strap and a gold metal logo clasp fastening front flap. 
The late 1980's bag has a burgundy leather lining with one zipped internal pocket and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, leather lining.

name: Crushed wool structured shorts
description:
Carven’s wide-leg shorts are a fabulous option for fall. A pure wool finish makes these a sumptuous piece; team them with a crisp white shirt and chunky knitwear to bring Parisian chic to your cold-weather wardrobe. 
These black crushed wool short shorts have a wide leg, a top button and zipped front fastening and slanted side pockets.
100% virgin wool. Lining: 57% viscose, 43% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Dalal cuff
description:
Ca & Lou drew on art deco influences to create this gold-plated Dalal cuff. Decorated with a smattering of Swarovski crystals, this striking piece is the perfect finishing touch to your after-dark outfit.
A yellow gold-plated wide cuff with a crystal embellished scalloped Art-Deco motif on each side. 
Yellow gold-plated brass, Swarovski crystals.

name: Frill trim pencil skirt
description:
With fall’s ladylike mood, all eyes are on the waist. This Cédric Charlier pencil skirt highlights your narrowest part and brings a classic silhouette into the 21st century with its rose gold zip front.   
This black crepe high-waisted pencil skirt has a wrap front and features a ruffle waistband detail with an off-centre rose-gold zip front fastening and a hidden internal zip fastening.
63% polyester, 32% rayon, 5% other fibres.
Dry clean.

name: Dalal necklace
description:
Ca & Lou’s yellow gold-plated Dalal necklace is a bold adornment. Shimmering with Swarovski crystals, this versatile piece is the perfect accent to your day and evening outfits.   
This yellow gold-plated necklace has a double-layer scalloped motif embellished with white crystals. 
The necklace has an adjustable lobster-claw and chain fastening. 
Yellow gold-plated brass, Swarovski crystals.

name: Yellow gold lucky charm bracelet
description:
Carolina Bucci is a firm favourite among the most sophisticated of stylistas and this intricate 18ct yellow gold and silk dream cloud bracelet perfectly exemplifies the label’s understated luxury.
A hot-pink silk thread woven with 18ct yellow gold fine chain friendship bracelet has 18ct yellow gold chain tassel ends and an dream-cloud lucky charm. 
The bracelet is to be tied around the wrist.
18ct yellow gold, silk.
Adjustable tied fastenings.

name: Diamond solitaire & yellow gold ring
description:
A timeless jewellery investment, this 9ct yellow gold diamond ring by Zoe & Morgan Fine Jewellery will make a treasured gift for the fashion-conscious woman.  Composed of an exquisitely cut solitaire stone, this piece will add a hint of luxury to your fingers.
9ct yellow gold diamond solitaire ring.  
This piece comes in a designer stamped black box.

name: Victoria fur trim quilted coat
description:
Experts in performance outwear, Canada Goose hit the nail on the head with this Victoria quilted coat. Its mid thigh-length provides coverage and protection from the city breeze while its fur-trimmed hood will bring a luxe touch when you’re hiking up a snowy trail. 
This black padded coat has a concealed centre-front zip and Velcro fastening, a wire and fleece lined hood featuring a detachable beige fur trim.     
The coat has zipped front pockets, a drawstring waist and long sleeves with ribbed-knit cuffs and hem.
The coat has a red, blue and white logo sleeve badge and buttoned single vent.
85% polyester, 15% cotton. Lining: 100% nylon. Lining 2: 100% nylon.   Filling: 100% goose down. Trim: 100% coyote fur.   
Dry clean.

name: Chrysoprase, sapphire & gold ring
description:
Add a unique adornment to your jewellery box with this chrysoprase, sapphire and 9ct gold antique arrow ring by Zoe & Morgan Fine Jewellery.  This finely crafted piece will make an ideal gift for your nearest and dearest.
This 9ct yellow-gold ring has a light-green chrysoprase centre-stone with small white-sapphires surrounding it and an arrow down either side.
2.85 grams of 9ct yellow gold, 0.18ct chrysoprase and white sapphire.

name: White gold lucky bracelet
description:
This 18ct white gold neon lucky bracelet by Carolina Bucci is the perfect complement to your everyday looks.  This beautifully crafted piece will make an appealing gift for any style-savvy woman.
This bracelet has a multi-colured neon thread woven with 18ct white gold fine chains. 
The bracelet has 18ct white gold tassel ends, a small 18ct white gold scarab beetle charm and ties around the wrist.
18ct white gold.

name: Homme-print T-shirt
description:
For a dose of tongue-in-cheek charm, this white T-shirt from Zoe Karssen is the perfect choice. Renowned for her playful slogans, pair this Homme style with tailored trousers and a boyfriend-fit blazer for irreverent off-duty style. 
This white fine-jersey T-shirt has a round-neck, short sleeves and features a black 'Hommes' and designer name front print. 
The T-shirt has a ribbed-jersey trimmed neckline with a raw hem and cuff edge. 
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: Bat-print sweatshirt
description:
Zoe Karssen brings an element of rebellion to her printed designs with this Bat-print sweatshirt. A relaxed-fit and signature quilted shoulders exude the labels casual-cool aesthetic. Combine this pastel-yellow piece with washed denim and nude pumps for a fresh off-duty look. 
This pale-yellow cotton sweatshirt has a round-neck and long sleeves with a black bat front print. 
The relaxed fitting top features quilted shoulders with a ribbed-knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs.
80% cotton, 20% polyester.
Machine wash.

name: Wild at Heart T-shirt
description:
Imbue your everyday essentials with the playful allure of Zoe Karssen with this Wild at Heart tee. Super-soft fabric and a raw trim make this style perfect for adding a directional edge to love-worn denim and leather.  
This dark-blue fine-jersey T-shirt has a round-neck, short sleeves and features a white 'Wild at Heart' front print. 
The T-shirt has a raw neckline, hem and cuff edge. 
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: Muse leopard-print dress
description:
The red leopard-print of this Muse dress from Camilla and Marc makes it a fierce addition to your weekend wardrobe. Cut-out detailing and a structured silhouette will flatter your figure; simply slip on point-toe heels as you head for cocktail hour.
This red, burgundy, black and pink leopard-print dress is sleeveless and has a low square-neck featuring a cut-away centre-front detail. 
The dress is fitted to the waist and has a loose fitting skater skirt with a concealed centre-back zip fastening. 
100% polyester. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Garden scuba dress
description:
Camilla and Marc take an avant-garde approach to eveningwear with this Garden scuba dress. The structured silhouette and cut-away detail give this LBD a directional twist. Opt for minimal accessories to let it take centre-stage.  
This black scuba-textured dress has capped sleeves and an scoop neck featuring a cut-away centre-front detail.
The dress is fitted to the waist and a pleated crossover skirt with a concealed centre-back zip fastening. 
95% polyester, 5% spandex. Contrast 63% cotton, 37% polyester. Lining: 94% polyester, 6% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Bat-print T-shirt
description:
Channelling a typically urban cool vibe, this Zoe Karssen Bat tee will bring a gothic charm to your off-duty wardrobe. Faded print adds a vintage feel to a simple cut, making it the perfect way to complete a leather look with rock chic attitude.
This white cotton-jersey T-shirt has a scoop-neck, short sleeves and a rolled cuff and hem finish.
The T-shirt has a faded black centre front bat-print.
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: Homme-print hooded sweatshirt
description:
Perfecting chic downtime dressing, Zoe Karssen brings a laidback quality to this grey Homme-print hooded sweatshirt. Throw yours on under a leather jacket to channel the labels urban cool vibe.  
This light-grey cotton-jersey sweatshirt has a drawstring hood, long sleeves and a kangaroo front pocket with a black 'Homme' and designer name front print. 
The relaxed fitting top has a ribbed-jersey trimmed hem and cuffs.
60% polyester, 40% cotton.
Machine wash.

name: Requiem one-shoulder dress
description:
Camilla and Marc keeps eveningwear sleek with this Requiem one-shoulder dress. Two large pockets and a cut-out front hem lend the look a directional edge. Style it with statement jewellery and a box clutch.  
This white sleeveless one-shoulder dress has double-georgette top featuring an asymmetric neckline and a twill skirt with two large pockets and a cut-out centre front hem detail.
The fitted dress has a concealed side zip fastening.
100% polyester. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Luedmyla leopard-print dress
description:
Laid-back, yet sophisticated, this Luedmyla dress from Camilla and Marc is an effortless gateway to cocktail dressing. Featuring a multicoloured leopard-print, all you need is a pair of high-fashion heels.
This midnight-blue, khaki-green, cobalt-blue and lime-green leopard-print sleeveless dress has a top panel overlay.
The dress has a round-neck, cut-away shoulders and a contrasting black waist panel.
The fitted dress has an asymmetric off-centre high hem-slit and a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
100% polyester. Combo: 65% polyester, 32% rayon, 3% spandex. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Amphora double-georgette dress
description:
A standout dress makes easy work of weekday outfit building. This bright-orange shift from Camilla and Marc is tweaked with capped sleeves and an asymmetric, cut-out hem. Wear it from am-to-pm, switching an oversized tote for a boxy clutch. 
This bright-orange shift dress has a round-neck, capped sleeves and an asymmetric cross-over off centre front slit with cut-away hem detail.
The slim fitting dress has a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
100% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Invocation geometric-jacquard dress
description:
A modern design given a sporty edge, this Invocation dress from Camilla and Marc epitomises the label’s youthful elegance. Its white angular panels and wrap style skirt create a form-fitting silhouette which will work best with simple heels. 
This navy, red and black geometric-jacquard sleeveless dress has a round-neck, a centre-front exposed zip fastening, cut away shoulders with contrasting white visible underlay. 
This fitted dress has a contrasting white waist panel, an asymmetric front hem slit and a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
100% polyester. Contrast: 65% polyester, 32% rayon, 3% spandex. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Alpine contrast panel dress
description:
Cobalt-blue panels brighten this black Alpine dress from Camilla and Marc. Designed with a soft blouson top and a contrasting fitted wrap style skirt, it’s perfect for cocktails with the girls. 
This black crepe dress has a round-neck, capped sleeves, turn-up cuffs and a contrasting cobalt-blue front panel, a white waistband and strap detail.
The slim-fitting dress has an asymmetric front hem slit and a centre-back slit with a top hook and skirt concealed zip fastening.
100% polyester. Contrast: 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Lining: 100% polyester. Lining 2: 95% polyester, 5% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Silent Moon one shoulder dress
description:
Showcase gym-honed shoulders in this Silent Moon dress from Camilla and Marc. Its ribbed leopard-print skirt is trimmed with black vinyl for added attitude. Black and gold accessories will complete the look perfectly. 
This sleeveless dress has one off the shoulder side and a fitted black jersey top with a hidden zip side fastening.
The dress has a yellow and brown leopard print ribbed textured skirt with a crossed over front, an off-centre front slit and an all-over black vinyl trim detail.
59% cotton, 35% nylon, 6% spandex. 
Combo 1: 52% nylon, 48% polyester.
Combo 2: 70% cotton, 30% polyurethane.
Lining 1 92% polyester, 8% spandex.
Lining 2:100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Superstition fitted dress
description:
This Superstition dress from Camilla and Marc will make a feminine addition to your round-the-clock wardrobe. Cut to an A-line skirt with a directional crossover front panel; keep your accessories simple as you move from lunch dates to cocktail hour. 
This mid blue sleeveless dress has a close-fitting round-neck, a back neck hook fastening and a centre back slit.
The dress has an A-line skirt with a flapped patch pocket and an off centre crossover front featuring a slit detail.
The dress has a hidden zip centre back skirt fastening.
100% polyester. 
Lining: 100% acetate
Dry clean.

name: Animal-print ribbed skirt
description:
Inspired by the work of Russian artist Kazimir Malevich, the abstract animal-print on this Camilla and Marc skirt is sure to make a statement. We love the lantern silhouette with a fitted top and ankle boots.  
This orange, black, blue, red and pink animal-print ribbed satin lantern skirt has a fitted waistband with a hidden zip centre back fastening.
80% polyester, 20% silk. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Motley slim-fit tailored trousers
description:
Invest in smartly tailored separates like these Motley trousers from Camilla and Marc. Sharply cut with a slim leg and cropped to the ankle, they’ll make the transition from desk to dinner effortless. Complete the look with a sheer blouse and metallic accessories. 
These black grosgrain tailored trousers have a slim tailored leg which is cropped to the ankle.
The trousers have slanted side-pockets, back jet-pockets and a black ribbed satin waistband with a top hook and zipped front fastening.
63% cotton, 37% polyester. Contrast: 80% polyester, 20% silk. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Mesh panel peplum top
description:
All eyes are on the waist this season. This mesh panel top from Camilla and Marc lets you showcase it in a subtle way and flares into a flattering peplum hem. Wear yours with cigarette trousers for a contemporary cocktail alternative. 
This white crepe sleeveless top has a mesh top panel with a close fitting round neck and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
The fitted top has a mesh waist band and a peplum hem.
100% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Diamond Grid animal-print top
description:
Abstract animal-print and a contrasting colour palette make this Diamond Grid top from Camilla and Marc an eye-catching piece. Wear it with leather trousers and pin-thin heels for a fierce round-the-clock look. 
This orange, black, pink, red and blue animal-print ribbed satin sleeveless top has a close fitting round-neck, a rounded hem and a racer back with a hidden zip centre back fastening.
80% polyester, 20% silk. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Lace front fitted dress
description:
Overtly feminine, this sleeveless dress from Camilla and Marc is equal parts sophisticated and modern. Black lace and mesh overlay a nude fitted bodice make it the perfect date piece; simply add heels and a blazer. 
This nude sleeveless dress has a black lace front overlay panel featuring a scalloped hem and a black mesh back overlay panel.
The fitted dress has a round neck, a hidden zip centre back fastening and a centre back hem slit.
50% cotton, 16% polyamide, 34% viscose. Combo: 76% nylon, 24% spandex. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% elastometric.
Dry clean.

name: Conversion lace top
description:
Bare shoulders give strength and sensuality to a look. This conversion lace top from Camilla and Marc is a great way to showcase them, with its sharply-cut racer sleeves. Team it with a leather skirt to toughen up the traditionally romantic style. 
This nude sleeveless top has a black lace front panel and a black mesh back panel.
The top has a close fitting round neck with a racer front and back cut and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
50% cotton, 16% polyamide, 34% viscose. Combo: 76% nylon, 24% spandex. Lining: 69% polyester, 4% elastometric.
Dry clean.

name: Wrap skirt dress
description:
White is this season’s must-have hue, and this wrap skirt dress from Camilla and Marc ticks the box. Cut to a modern silhouette, the small roll-neck has a mesh insert, needing little by way of accessory. Wear it with metallic heels for cocktails in the city.  
This ivory sleeveless dress has a loose fitting crepe top with a small roll-neck and white mesh neckline.
The dress has a piqué textured skirt featuring a wrap front, side pocket details and back jet pocket details.
The dress has a centre back slit from the neck to the waist band and a hidden zip centre back skirt fastening.
100% polyester. Lining: 100% polyester. Lining 2% 100% acetate.
Dry clean.

name: Meridian dress
description:
An LBD is central to every woman’s wardrobe. The Meridian dress from Camilla and Marc is the perfect choice for after-hours, with its figure-hugging silhouette and deep V back that guarantees a dramatic exit. 
This black textured sleeveless dress features a cross-over bandage front detailing and a centre-front black sheer mesh panel.
The fitted dress has a close-fitting V-neck, cut-away shoulders, a deep V-back and an asymmetric hem with a centre-back concealed zip fastening. 
80% polyester, 20% silk. Contrast: 100% polyester. Lining: 100% cupra. 
Dry clean.

name: Rotation mesh panel dress
description:
Camilla and Marc’s take on the LBD is the very essence of modern dressing – simple, versatile and a little sporty. Cut from a scuba-like fabric; this fitted style has a mesh overlay bodice and flares at the waist. Keep your look pared-back – metallic heels and a clutch will suffice. 
This black jersey sleeveless dress has a fitted top with a black mesh over-lay, a close fitting round neck and a racer back with a zipped centre back fastening.
The dress has a skater skirt with a black mesh hem panel.
95% polyester, 5% spandex. Contrast: 100% polyester. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% elastane.
Dry clean.

name: New York girls-print T-shirt
description:
Imbue your weekend wardrobe with the quirky-cool of Zoe Karssen with this black tee. Reinvigorating this classic style with a statement New York girls slogan, team this playful piece with printed denim for a downtown cool look. 
This black cotton-jersey T-shirt has a round-neck and short-sleeves with a faded white 'New York Girls' centre front slogan print.
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: This is Not a Love Song sweater
description:
Paying home to the classic Public Image Ltd single, Zoe Karssen’s ‘This is Not a Love Song’ design is a great downtown staple. Team it with jeans and ankle boots for a cool daytime combination.
This coral wool blend fine knit sweater has a white intarsia knit 'This is not a love song' and broken heart centre front motif.
The slim fit sweater has a crew-neck and long-sleeves with a ribbed knit cuff, hem and neckline trim.
92% wool, 8% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Continuous sheer-panel jumpsuit
description:
For those seeking an after-hours option with a difference, opt for this Continuous jumpsuit from Camilla and Marc. It's a directional move away from the LBD that doesn't sacrifice on feminine appeal. Wear it with point-toe heels and a blazer draped over your shoulders.  
This black sleeveless jumpsuit has a silk fitted top with a close fitting round neck and a sheer mesh centre front panel.
The jumpsuit has a tapered-leg with a high rise, a crossover front feature, a grosgrain waistband and a rolled cuff detail.
The jumpsuit has a hidden zip centre back fastening.
100% polyester. Combo: 100% silk. Combo 2: 100% polyester. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% elastane.
Dry clean.

name: Merit animal-print banded dress
description:
Camilla and Marc’s wild side is on full display with this Merit dress. Imagined in a colourful animal-print satin, it’ll ensure you stand out from the crowd. Style it with simple sandals, unfastening the front zip slightly to flash a hint of skin.
This orange, black, purple, pink, blue and red animal print ribbed textured satin sleeveless dress has a fitted top with boning and a bitted waistband.
The dress has a pencil skirt with an exposed zip centre front feature and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
80% polyester, 20% silk. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Tiger-print T-shirt
description:
Printed with bold grey tiger, Zoe Karssen’s cotton-blend tee is an irresistibly cool style. Finished with raw-edge seams, wear yours with love-worn denim and a biker jacket to work the label's laid-back aesthetic.  
This black cotton-jersey T-shirt has a round-neck, short sleeves and raw edges with a grey tiger and "Le plus cool" front print.
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: Eau Yeah print sweatshirt
description:
Zoe Karssen’s slogan designs never fail to bring a smile to our face. This Eau Yeah sweatshirt is a great option for Francophiles. Use it to brighten up love-worn denim and your favourite leather jacket.  
This cobalt-blue cotton-jersey sweatshirt features a white " Eau Yeah" front print.
The relaxed-fitting sweatshirt has a crew-neck, long sleeves and a ribbed shoulder detail with a finely ribbed-jersey neckline, hem and cuffs.
80% cotton, 20% polyester.
Machine wash.

name: Arrow-print sweatshirt
description:
Zoe Karssen adds a touch of playfulness to this black sweatshirt with an illustrated white arrow-print. Team it with skinny jeans and a collared shirt for a preppy yet on-trend approach to casual dressing.
This black cotton jersey sweatshirt has a round-neck and long sleeves with a centre-front white arrow-print.
The sweatshirt has a ribbed-jersey trimmed neckline hem and cuffs.
80% cotton, 20% polyester.
Machine wash.

name: Crème de la Crème-print sweater
description:
Famed for their slogan sweatshirts, Zoe Karssen’s Crème de la Crème version is set to be your off-duty go-to. Complete the look with jeans and wedge trainers as you head downtown. 
This light-blue cotton-jersey sweatshirt features a black "Crème de la Crème" front print.
The relaxed-fitting sweatshirt has a crew-neck, long sleeves and a ribbed shoulder detail with a finely ribbed-jersey neckline, hem and cuffs.
80% cotton, 20% polyester.
Machine wash.

name: Night Fever-print T-shirt
description:
Instantly recognisable as the work of Amsterdam-based Zoe Karssen, this Night Fever-print tee features the label’s signature bat motif. Wear yours with boyfriend jeans and a leather jacket to master rock’n’roll-cool. 
This black cotton-jersey T-shirt has a round-neck, short sleeves and raw edges with a grey bat and 'Night Fever' centre front print.
50% cotton, 50% modal.
Machine wash.

name: Missing Unicorn-print sweatshirt
description:
Famed for their quirky designs, Zoe Karssen stays true to form with this Missing Unicorn-print sweatshirt. A weekend must-have, we love it paired with boyfriend denim and high-shine shoes. 
This grey-marl jersey sweatshirt features a black unicorn and "Missing Unicorn Stolen" front print.
The relaxed-fit sweatshirt has a crew-neck, long sleeves and a ribbed shoulder detail with a finely ribbed-jersey neckline, hem and cuffs.
66% polyester, 34% cotton
Machine wash.

name: Aosta fur-trim quilted coat
description:
This Aosta coat from Canada Goose is guaranteed to keep you warm thanks to its quilted lining and coyote-fur trim. Wear yours with skinny jeans and biker boots in the city, packing it in your luggage when you head to the mountains. 
This charcoal-grey padded flannel coat has a concealed centre-front zip and button fastening and a wire-lined hood with a detachable beige fur trim. 
The coat has buttoned  flapped-front pockets, side pockets, long sleeves and a logo-embossed leather sleeve badge with ribbed-knit cuffs and hem.   
100% wool. Lining: 100% polyester. Lining 2: 100% nylon. Filling: 100% goose down. Trim: 100% coyote fur. 
Dry clean.

name: Chilliwack fur-trim down coat
description:
Surprisingly lightweight, this Chilliwack bomber from Canada Goose is padded with down and features a coyote fur-trimmed hood. Providing warmth without the bulk, it’s the most stylish way to keep cosy come the colder months.
This khaki-green down coat has a high-neck collar and a fur trimmed hood with a button and concealed zip centre-front fastening
The bomber-style coat has long sleeves with a zipped sleeve pocket and a logo embroidered badge.  
The coat has front flapped pockets, side pockets and features black ribbed-knit trimmed cuffs and hemline.
85% polyester, 15% cotton. Lining: 100% nylon. Lining 2: 100% nylon. Filling: 100% goose down. Trim: 100% coyote fur.   
Dry clean.

name: Princess diamond and rose gold ring
description:
Encrusted with princess-cut cognac diamonds, this 9ct rose gold ring from Zoe & Morgan Fine Jewellery glistens at every angle. A treasure-forever design, it makes the perfect gift for a loved one.
A 9ct rose gold ring embellished with Princess cut cognac diamonds. 
9ct rose gold, cognac diamonds.

name: Trillium fur-trim parka
description:
With a cinched drawstring waist, ribbed-knit cuffs and mid-thigh length, the Trillium parka from Canada Goose is designed to offer the best in extreme weather protection. Its detachable coyote fur hood doesn’t hold water, whilst its goose feather down is regarded as the world’s finest insulator. 
This khaki-green padded parka-coat has a button and concealed zip centre-front fastening, a wire and fleece-lined hood and features a detachable beige fur trim.          
The quilted coat has a drawstring waist and long sleeves with ribbed-knit trimmed cuffs and hem.     
The coat has a side pockets, buttoned patch pockets and features a red, blue and white logo embroidered sleeve badge.
85% polyester, 15% cotton. Lining: 100% nylon. Lining 2: 100% nylon.   Filling: 100% goose down. Trim: 100% coyote fur.        
Dry clean.

name: Diamond, chrysoprase and gold star ring
description:
Fusing colourful stones and eye-catching diamonds is what Zoe & Morgan Fine Jewellery does best. This 18ct gold ring features a vibrant green chrysoprase with a whimsical star. Wear yours solo with evening dresses. 
This 18ct yellow gold ring has an oval chrysoprase stone, surrounded by diamonds and with a centre diamond on a yellow gold star setting. 
18ct yellow gold, diamond, chrysoprase.

name: Pink gold baby girl bracelet
description:
Opt for an eclectic everyday accessory with this 18ct pink gold baby girl bracelet by Carolina Bucci.  Wear this pretty fine jewellery piece with your off-duty apparel for a touch of chic.
This 18ct gold fine-chain bracelet is woven with pink thread and has tassel ends.
The bracelet ties around the wrist and has a small baby girl 18ct gold charm.
18ct gold, cotton.

name: Gold secret key bracelet
description:
Revisit childhood memories in decidedly grown-up style with this 18ct black gold friendship bracelet from Carolina Bucci. Intricately interwoven with a black silk thread, this delicate piece holds the key to charming jewellery pieces with a playful charm.
An 18ct black gold fine chain friendship bracelet woven with black silk thread.
The bracelet has an 18ct black gold chain tassel ends and a secret key charm. 
The bracelet is to be tied around the wrist.
18ct black gold, silk.

name: Diamond and yellow gold bracelet
description:
Accent your attire with a touch of subtle elegance with this 18ct gold and diamond bracelet by Carolina Bucci.  Wear with printed chiffon evening dress, platform peep toe sandals and a neutral tone leather bag for a decadent after-dark finish.  Styled here with 
 and 
 and 
.
Small champagne diamonds set in 18ct gold along the top. 
18ct gold fine chain and white silk thread woven bracelet. 
Small hook fastening. 
18ct gold, silk, champagne diamonds.

name: Dorset fur-trim down coat
description:
The white down-filled Dorset parka from Canada Goose features all the technology of their performance pieces, adjusted for everyday wear. A removable down hood and coyote fur-trim lets you switch up your look in line with the elements, whilst tricot-lined pockets and earphone guides make the commute much more bearable.

Lining: 48% polyester, 52% viscose.

name: Zebra-print textured coat
description:
What better way to wear animal-print this season than with Carven’s urban zebra-print coat? Crafted from wool and cashmere, it’s the perfect way to keep warm in style this winter. 
This black and grey textured zebra-print coat has wide notch lapels, a double breasted button fastening and long sleeves.
The straight-cut coat has four front pockets and a single back vent.
70% virgin wool, 20% nylon, 10% cashmere. Lining: 65% acetate, 35% viscose.
Dry clean.

name: Lace-trim flannel mini-skirt
description:
Pretty lace detailing gives this flannel skirt from Carven feminine flair. Cut to an A-line silhouette and mini length, it’s a chic addition to chunky knitwear or a silk blouse. 
This charcoal-grey wool in stripe A-line mini skirt has an off-centre front hem slit with a charcoal-grey lace feature.
The skirt has a hidden zip centre back fastening.
94% wool, 4% polyester, 2% spandex. Lining: 47% polyester, 53% viscose.
Dry clean.

name: Cross-collar cotton shirt
description:
Channel Carven’s Parisian aesthetic with this cotton shirt. The cross-collar and short sleeves give shirting a chic update. Complete the look with a mini skirt and opaque tights.
This white cotton shirt has short sleeves and a centre-front button fastening with a V-neck featuring an attached cross collar.
100% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Allure floral swing dress
description:
The perfect companion for globe-trotting escapades, this Zimmermann Swing dress is a beautiful way to stay cool in the heat. Throw on over a bikini or wear with wedges for an evening of cocktails by the sea. 
This black, pink, green and taupe floral print silk sleeveless dress has skinny shoulder straps and a black and cream stripe trimmed top edge trim.
The loose fitting dress has a drop-waist skirt panel with a frill edge detail and easily slips on.
100% silk. 
Hand wash.

name: Wool-crepe sleeveless dress
description:
Tuxedo dressing the Carven way; this wool-crepe sleeveless dress is an after-hours must-have. It’s sharply tailored, with satin peaked lapels and the label’s signature curved hem and flapped pockets. Style it with pointed flats for your own spin on Left Bank chic. 
This black wool-crepe sleeveless dress has a V-neck and a single satin peaked-lapel with a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
The slim fitting straight-cut dress has two front flapped pockets and side pockets. 
55% polyester, 45% wool. Combo: 100% polyester. Lining: 65% acetate, 35% viscose.
Dry clean.

name: Allure floral peplum swimsuit
description:
Statement beachwear is a Zimmermann forte, and this Allure floral peplum swimsuit epitomises luxe sun-worshipping style. Optional halterneck straps and a seductive open back offer versatility and support. Wear yours solo when you hit the beach, slipping on black shorts for cocktails around the pool. 
This black one piece swimsuit has a pink, gold, green, blush and white floral print with beige and black stripe-print elasticated trimmed edges. 
The strapless swimsuit has underwire padded cups, an open back, boned sides and a back strap with a logo engraved gunmetal clasp. 
The swimsuit has a peplum waist detail and comes with optional self fastening halterneck straps featuring gunmetal toggle ends. 
80% nylon, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Iridescent-print skirt
description:
Carven’s multicoloured iridescent-print skirt is a mesmerising style. Its soft pastel palette only adds to its appeal. Wear yours with chunky heels and a lightweight knit for a winning combination.
A high-waisted A-line mini skirt with a multi-coloured iridescent print.
The velvet-textured skirt has a concealed centre-back zip fastening. 
97% cotton, 3% elastane. Lining:  57% viscose, 43% polybutylene terephthalate.
Dry clean.

name: Drifter bikini
description:
Based in Australia, Zimmermann know a thing or two about creating exotic swimwear, and this Drifter bikini is ideal for a dose of surfer-chic. Mix and match separates exude youthful-cool so wear yours as you ride the waves. 
This multi-print bikini has a red, grey, black, orange and green floral-print soft cup triangle top with a self-tie halter-neck fastening and self-tie fastening back strap. 
The bikini has blue and cream contrasting print briefs with a low rise.
80% nylon, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Double-breasted wool jacket
description:
Carven’s double breasted ivory wool-blend jacket gives the classic tuxedo jacket a twist. Nipped at the waist, it creates a flattering silhouette. Wear it with a crisp shirt and statement skirt for a playful alternative to cocktail dresses.
This ivory wool jacket has a small notch lapels, long sleeves and a chest-pocket with a double breasted button front fastening.
80% wool, 20% nylon. Lining: 65% acetate, 35% viscose.
Dry clean

name: Frill bandeau bikini
description:
Step into the wild with Zimmermann’s Frill bandeau bikini. A flattering boned structure and optional straps adorned with colourful print make this a fabulous beach essential with mix-and-match appeal.  
This bandeau bikini has multicoloured floral and animal print layered frill soft cups with a boned sweetheart neckline, a clasp fastening back strap and optional matching skinny self-tie halterneck straps. 
The bikini has beige, brown and black animal print briefs with a low rise.
80% nylon, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Allure floral-print bikini
description:
Exquisitely printed with exotic feminine florals, this Allure bikini from Zimmermann is guaranteed to be a poolside hit. Make a splash on your next exotic getaway by pairing with cork wedges and a flowing kaftan. 
This black, pink and green floral-print bikini has a moulded cup underwire top with an optional self tie halter-neck straps and a clasp fastening back strap. 
The matching briefs have a cream and black stripe top and edge trim detail.
80% nylon, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% nylon, 10% elastane
Hand wash.

name: Sundance wide leg trousers
description:
In embroidered ivory silk, Zimmermann’s Sundance wide-leg trousers are an unreservedly chic poolside style. A relaxed fit and elasticated waistband make them easy to pull on over swimwear – just add a silk tee and pretty sandals for lunch dates and sightseeing. 
These ivory silk fully embroidered trousers have a loose fitting wide leg and a high rise.
The relaxed fit trousers have slanted side-pockets and an elasticated back waist band.
100% silk. Embroidery: 100% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Keeper embroidered cover-up
description:
This Keeper cover-up from Zimmermann is a versatile warm-weather piece. The loose-fitting silhouette is delicately embroidered and features intricate cut-out detailing. It’s perfect by the pool over a printed bikini but looks equally as chic styled with cut-off denim on home turf.
This ivory cotton cover-up has a round neck with a drawstring and centre front slit detail.
The loose fitting cover-up has an all-over embroidered feature with long-sleeves and embroidered lace finished edges.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Allure broderie anglaise kaftan dress
description:
Zimmermann’s Allure kaftan will slot seamlessly into your vacation repertoire. The broderie anglaise detailing exudes bohemian decadence; wear yours over a bright bikini as you stroll the shores. 
This black silk and cotton-blend broderie anglaise dress has a V-neck and a back-neck button fastening featuring with a long key-hole opening. 
The dress has a loose fitting top with batwing 3/4 length sleeves featuring elasticated cuffs. 
The dress has a fitted waistband and is fitted over the hips with a full pleated skirt.
40% silk, 60% cotton. Lining: 100% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Frill dot-print swimsuit
description:
Zimmermann nod to vintage styles with this polka-dot navy swimsuit. Gathered side seams will sculpt your waist, whilst the clasp-fastened back adds optimum support. Attach the halterneck strap whilst you swim, removing it for minimal tan lines.  
This navy-blue and white dot print swimsuit has a sweet heart neckline with a frill detail and an optional self tie skinny halter neck strap.
The swimsuit has gathered side seams and a low scoop back with a clasp fastening back strap.
70% nylon, 30% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Snake bikini briefs
description:
These snake-print bikini briefs from Zimmermann have self-tie sides that can be adjusted for the perfect fit. They feature a hint of elastane and stay in place as you swim. Complete the look with the matching top. 
These navy tone-on-tone snake-print bikini briefs have a low-rise and self-tie side fastenings with logo engraved silver-metal toggle ends. 
80% polyester, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% nylon, 10% elastane. 
Hand wash.

name: Wide link paisley-print bikini briefs
description:
Zimmermann’s feminine swimwear pieces are a holiday must-have, and these paisley-print bikini briefs will make a charming addition to your collection. Complete with a wide metal side link, we’ll be wearing ours with the co-ordinating top when we hit the beach.   
These beige, purple, pink, orange and green paisley print bikini briefs have silver metal rectangular shaped side link details.
90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Wide link dot-print bikini briefs
description:
These navy-blue bikini briefs from Zimmermann are printed with white dots and have rectangular-shaped links on both sides. Wear them with the matching top or mix and match with the label's other colourful styles. 
These navy-blue and white dot print bikini briefs have silver metal rectangular shaped side link details.
90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Instinct choker maxi dress
description:
This Instinct maxi dress from Zimmermann is ideal for that last-minute getaway. It's made from floral-print silk and features a gold metal choker that takes it right through to evening. 
This beige, pink, yellow and navy-blue floral print silk sleeveless dress has a halter-neck with a gold metal choker detail and a centre front and back key hole cut-out.
The loose fitting maxi-dress has an optional matching skinny self tie waist belt to cinch in at the waist.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Dot-print bandeau bikini top
description:
No vacation wardrobe is complete without a bandeau bikini top, and Zimmermann's navy-blue and white dot-print style is a playful option. The cups are lightly padded for extra support and comfort so it's ideal for both active beach activities and sunbathing. Complete the set with the matching briefs. 
This navy-blue and white dot print bandeau bikini has lightly padded cups with removable padding and a silver metal rectangular shaped link centre front feature.
The bikini top has a clasp fastening back strap and a removable skinny halter neck strap.
90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Scout bikini
description:
Australian brand Zimmermann is our go-to for swimwear sets with a modern flair, and this Scout bikini comprises a monochrome crochet top and contrasting floral-print bottoms. Bird-shaped metal charms add a playful, feminine twist.
This bikini has a black and white crochet triangle top with self tie halterneck straps and back strap featuring gunmetal bird charm end details.
The bikini has cream, orange, black and pink floral print briefs with a low-rise and black plaited side straps featuring gunmetal bird charm end details.
80% nylon, 20% elastane. 
Hand wash.

name: Paisley-print bandeau bikini top
description:
Pack Zimmermann’s paisley-print bikini top for your next stylish getaway. It can be worn as both a  bandeau or halterneck style and will look great with the matching briefs and a floppy hat.  
This beige, pink, purple, orange and green paisley-print bandeau bikini top has lightly padded cups with removable padding and a silver metal rectangular shaped centre link.
The bikini top has a clasp fastening back strap and an optional self tie fastening halter-neck strap with logo engraved toggle ends.
90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Scout Ikat-print trousers
description:
Zimmermann’s Scout Ikat-print trousers are perfect for the beach-to-bar transition. Cut from lightweight cotton for a high-rise fit and cropped length, you can slip them over a bikini on the beach or dress them up with heels for evening. 
These black and cream ikat-print cotton trousers have a high-rise, a straight leg and are cropped to the ankle.
The relaxed fitting trousers have an elasticated waist and cuffs.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Instinct V-neck swimsuit
description:
Designed to get you noticed, this Instinct leopard-print swimsuit from Zimmermann is a fierce holiday option. Gathered front detailing will sculpt your figure and define your waist, and the deep V-neck will draw attention to your curves. 
This brown and beige leopard-print swimsuit has a V-neck with a gathered wrap-over front and a waistband panel.
The swimsuit has a racer back.
90% nylon, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Instinct multi-print bikini
description:
Printed with a contrasting colourful pattern, this Instinct bikini from Zimmermann is a high-impact choice. Underwired, moulded cups and adjustable shoulder straps make it easy to find the perfect fit, and the briefs have wide side panels for optimum coverage. Wear yours as a striking two-piece on your next exotic excursion. 
This multicoloured multi-print bikini has paisley, floral and leopard print panels and paisley print seam trims with matching adjustable skinny shoulder straps.
The bikini top has underwired moulded cups and a clasp fastening back strap with gold metal hardware.
The bikini has leopard-print briefs.
80% nylon, 20% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Drifter floral-print bikini
description:
Zimmermann’s Drifter floral-print bikini is a vibrant option for your next sun-soaked getaway. Underwire padded cups and a removable halterneck strap make this a flattering and versatile style. Add sandals and a long flowing kaftan for a stroll along the beach. 
This multicolored floral-print bikini has a bandeau top with underwire padded cups, a clasp fastening back strap and optional fastening halterneck straps. 
The bikini has matching briefs with silver metal heart side details.
90% nylon, 10% elastane
Hand wash

name: Snake triangle bikini top
description:
Triangle bikinis like this snake-print style from Zimmermann are cut to flatter any shape. Fully-lined and featuring padded cups; it’s not only chic, but comfortable too. Wear yours with the matching briefs for an understated poolside look. 
This navy tone-on-tone snake-print bikini top has triangle cups with removable padding.
The bikini top has a self-fastening halter neck and back strap featuring logo engraved silver metal toggle ends. 
80% nylon, 20% elastane. Lining: 90% polyester, 10% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Scout Ikat-print dress
description:
For glamorous vacation style, look no further than Zimmermann's Ikat-print Scout dress. It’s cut from lightweight cotton so is ideal for slipping on after a long hot day at the beach. Complement the black and cream hues with golden sandals and a natural woven tote.  
This black and cream ikat-print, lightweight cotton maxi dress has a deep V-neck with a drawstring tie keyhole front fastening.
The loose fitting maxi-dress has long sleeves and a centre-back hidden zipped fastening.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Keeper frill bandeau bikini
description:
You’ll want to wear Zimmernann’s Keeper bikini both home and abroad thanks to the floral print and ruffled front. Complete with matching briefs and optional halter-neck straps; style  it with stacks of gold jewellery and a straw hat. 
This beige, red, purple, green, yellow and blue floral print bikini has a bandeau top with padded cups, a wired sweetheart neckline and a frill top feature.
The bikini top has a clasp fastening back strap and an optional skinny halter-neck strap with a self tied fastening.
The matching briefs have a low rise.
80% nylon, 20% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Scout layered multi-print bikini
description:
Mix-and-match bikinis are a stylish getaway essential, and none come more impactful than this Scout style from Zimmermann. It features a floral-print top, wave patterned briefs, a fun sweetheart neckline and ruffled front. We’ll be wearing ours as a strapless bandeau when soaking up the sun.  
This multi-print bikini has a cream, orange, black, turquoise and pink floral print bandeau top with a wired sweetheart neckline featuring a double ruffle detail.
The top has a clasp fastening back strap and an optional skinny halter neck strap with gunmetal toggle ends.
The bikini has black and cream wave print briefs.
80% nylon, 20% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Quilted leather shoulder bag
description:
The jewel-tone of this Chanel vintage piece elegantly contrasts with the iconic gold C’s. A treasure-forever piece you won’t want to put down. 
This vintage piece has been carefully sourced, any imperfections it may feature only add to the overall character and appeal.
This navy-blue quilted leather bag has a leather and gold metal chain shoulder strap and a front flap with a gold metal logo detail and a button fastening. 
The early 1990's bag has a navy-blue leather lining with one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, leather lining.

name: Quilted leather shoulder bag
description:
A timeless classic, this Chanel Vintage piece proudly features the CC logo and covetable metal chain. An aura of elegance surrounds what is recognised as one of fashions most prestigious accessories. 
This vintage piece has been carefully sourced, any imperfections it may feature only add to the overall character and appeal.
This black quilted leather shoulder bag has an optional leather and gold metal chain shoulder strap and a front flap with a gold metal logo clasp fastening. 
The early 1990's bag has a red leather lining with one zipped internal pocket and two open internal pockets.
Leather, metal, leather lining.

name: Quilted fabric clutch
description:
This Chanel Vintage clutch is a style investment of the most sublime. Complete with a statement gold tassel detail that intensifies its vintage charm, this piece is the optimum in Parisian-luxe. 
This vintage piece has been carefully sourced, any imperfections it may feature only add to the overall character and appeal.
This black quilted fabric clutch bag has black leather piping edges and an envelope button fastening front flap with a quilted logo detail. 
The bag has metallic gold leather and gold metal chain shoulder strap and a matching leather and logo embossed gold metal tassel side detail. 
This 1980's bag has a red-leather lining with one zipped internal pocket.
Fabric, metal, leather lining.

name: Quilted CC-clasp bag
description:
A classic covetable accessory, this black Chanel Vintage Quilted CC-clasp bag is a timeless investment.  A glamorous yet understated design; carry yours in the evening for a luxe Parisian accent. 
This vintage piece has been carefully sourced, any imperfections it may feature only add to the overall character and appeal.
This black quilted-leather bag has a black leather and gold metal woven shoulder strap and a curved front-flap with a gold metal CC-logo twist clasp.  
The 1988-94 vintage bag has a burgundy leather lining, one zipped internal pocket, one open internal pockets and a stitched-logo under the flap.

name: Neon hem cropped trousers
description:
Cédric Charlier showcase their exquisite tailoring with these black high-rise trousers. Flashes of neon-pink at the hemline lend this pair a contemporary feel. Elevate this cropped style with high heel pumps after hours.
These black crepe trousers have a high-rise, tapered leg and are cropped to the ankle with a neon-pink trimmed hem. 
The slim-fit trousers have a rose gold side zip fastening. 
88% polyester, 12% polyurethane.
Dry clean.

name: Seam detail dress
description:
Cédric Charlier’s neon-pink seam detail dress is flattering evening piece. Featuring a deep V-neck and contoured seam panel detailing, this vibrant style is perfect for cocktails. Simply add heels and a compact clutch. 
This neon-pink sleeveless dress has a deep V-neck and a contoured seam panel detailing with a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
88% polyester, 12% polyurethane.
Dry clean.

name: Sheer-panel textured sweater
description:
Cédric Charlier nods towards his recent runway collection with this sheer panel sweater – the minimal structure and texture mash-up making it a contemporary addition to slim-leg tailoring. 
This grey wool knit sweater has a white ribbed-knit close-fitting round neck, sheer white shoulder panels, a grey textured-knit front panel and black short sleeves.
The slim-fitting sweater has a centre-back zip fastening.
100% virgin wool. 
Dry clean.

name: Meets Patternity intarsia-knit sweater
description:
Embrace the statement sweater with this square and spot knit from Chinti and Parker Meets Patternity. Monochrome graphics make a bold impact atop pure cashmere; team it with jeans at the weekend, switching to tailored trousers for a smarter look. 
A black and white sweater with a large-square and small spot intarsia-knit motif. 
The sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with a slim trimmed ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

description:
High quality knitwear with a graphic edge; this intarsia-knit cardigan is the combined effort of Chinti and Parker Meets Patternity. A boxy over-sized silhouette makes it an ideal trans-seasonal cover-up, whilst its punchy pattern will transform monochrome separates. 
This black and white triangle-print chunky-knit cardigan has an open centre-front, wrist-length loose-fitting sleeves and side pockets with black ribbed-knit trimmed edges. 
100% merino wool.
Hand wash.

description:
Texture is key to new season dressing. Cédric Charlier embraces the mood with his crew-neck sweater; a boxy style comprised of contrasting wool, felt and metallic fabric panels. Work the trend head-to-toe and wear with a high-shine vinyl skirt. 
A grey wool-knit sweater with a felt, metallic and textured cuff to cuff panels with an exposed centre-back zip fastening.
The sweater has a black ribbed-knit trimmed crew-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed-knit hem and cuffs.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
100% wool. Combo: 93% wool, 7% polyamide. Combo 2: 90% virgin wool, 6% polyurethane, 4% other fibres.
Dry clean.

description:
This window-pane check sweater is part of an exciting partnership between Chinti and Parker Meets Patternity. The former’s luxurious cashmere is lent a graphic punch thanks to the latter’s signature print work. Paired with a pencil skirt is the freshest way to wear it. 
A black and white cashmere-knit sweater with window-pane check print and a centre black triangle. 
The relaxed-fitting sweater has a boat-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs.

name: Meets Patternity square, dot & triangle sweater
description:
This intarsia-knit sweater from Chinti and Parker Meets Patternity is a graphic way to sport a statement knit. Spun from the softest cashmere, it’s a decadent addition to your weekday wardrobe. 
A black and white cashmere-knit sweater with a spot-print, a check-print and a black centre triangle. 
The relaxed-fitting sweater has a boat-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs. 
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Meets Patternity triangle intarsia-knit sweater
description:
Chinti and Parker takes a graphic approach to knitwear with the help of pattern experts Patternity, this triangle intarsia-knit sweater a statement option. Wear yours to lend every look a bold finish. 
This navy and white triangle intarsia-knit sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with a slim trimmed ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.

name: Meets Patternity square & spot sweater
description:
Window-pane checks are the chicest way to sport this season’s statement prints. Chinti and Parker make it easy with this intarsia-knit cashmere sweater – part of an exciting collaboration with art-collective, Patternity. Try it tucked into a leather mini-skirt with preppy Penny loafers. 
A navy and white sweater with a large square and small spot intarsia-knit motif. 
The sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with a slim trimmed ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs. 
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Contrast-cuff cashmere sweater
description:
Famed for luxurious knitwear, Chinti and Parker perfect off-duty dressing with this contrast-cuff sweater. Spun from pure cashmere for a super-soft finish, it’s sure to be your go-to when the weather starts to chill. Team yours with faded jeans and high-shine pumps for lunch with friends. 
This cobalt-blue cashmere sweater has a round neck, long sleeves and contrasting bright-yellow and neon-pink cuff detail with small side hem slits. 
The slim fitting sweater has ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuff. 
100% cashmere.
Dry clean.

name: Aran-knit wool sweater
description:
Chinti and Parker update a classic heritage design with this cobalt-blue Aran-knit sweater. Oversized and spun from the finest merino wool, it’s the perfect blend of comfort and style. 
This cobalt-blue Aran, cable, plait and honeycomb-knit oversized sweater has a crew-neck and long sleeves with ribbed knit cuffs, hem and neckline. 
100% merino wool.
Dry clean.

name: Contrast-cuff cashmere sweater
description:
The contrasting cuffs of this Chinti and Parker sweater set it apart from classic cashmere basics. Its lightweight handle is perfect for trans-seasonal wardrobes, style it now with cropped denim, layering it up during the colder months. 
This grey cashmere sweater has a round-neck, long sleeves and contrasting bright-yellow and neon-pink cuff detail with small side hem slits. 
The slim fitting sweater has ribbed-knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuff.
100% cashmere.
Dry clean.

name: Queue de Pie patent leather pumps
Meets Patternity Aran giant-dot knit sweater
Quilted leather shoulder bag

description:
Luxurious staples are a Chinti and Parker forte, and this blue intarsia-knit sweater will add a vibrant pop of colour to every look. Layer this pure cashmere piece over slim-fit denim for an easy daytime combination.
This aqua blue and what star intarsia knit sweater has a crew-neck and long-sleeves with a ribbed knit cuff, hem and neckline trim.
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Contrast shoulder button sweater
description:
Chinti and Parker’s classic sweater is a wardrobe staple. Cut from super soft navy-blue cashmere with a shoulder button fastening; team yours with love-worn denim and loafers for a laid-back weekend look. 
This navy-blue cashmere sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with a shoulder button fastening featuring a contrasting bright-pink trim.
The slim-fitting sweater has ribbed-knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs.       
100% cashmere.       
Hand wash.

Chinti and Parker’s intarsia-knit sweater is a eye-catching way to wear print. Spun from pure cashmere, it’s a sumptuous addition to boyfriend denim or leather leggings at the weekend. 
This navy-blue, turquoise, neon-yellow and point intarsia star knit cashmere sweater has a crew-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed knit cuff, hem and neckline trim.

Hand wash.

Chinti and Parker’s grey and blue sweater is a playful twist on the class grey cashmere knit. Featuring crescent moon motifs, accessorise with complimenting accessories to really make the pattern pop.

hem and neckline trim.

Featuring an array of multicoloured stars, Chinti and Parker’s intarsia-knit sweater is a fun new season staple. Spun from the finest cashmere, this lightweight piece is perfect for casual days downtown.

name: Exclusive Love Forever cashmere sweater
description:
Inspired by the sugary hues of neon signage, this Love Forever sweater from Chinti and Parker carries a charming message. We’ll be wearing this MATCHESFASHION.COM exclusive with a leather skirt and brogues.
A navy-blue cashmere sweater with a multicoloured Love Forever intarsia-knit front feature.
The relaxed fitting sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Exclusive Bisous cashmere sweater
description:
Chinti and Parker have love on their mind this season, knitting the French word for ‘kisses’ onto this MATCHESFASHION.COM exclusive sweater. Team yours with everything from pleated skirts to distressed denim. 
A bright-pink cashmere sweater with a multicoloured Bisous intarsia-knit chest feature.  
The slim fitting sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.  
100% cashmere.  
Hand wash.

name: Exclusive Grid cashmere sweater
description:
Inspired by light-up dance floors, this Grid sweater is part of an exclusive collaboration with MATCHESFASHION.COM and Chinti and Parker.  Let its graphic squares and cool colourway take you from day to disco. 
A bright-blue and ivory cashmere sweater with an all-over mini grid intarsia-knit. 
The slim fitting sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs. 
100% cashmere. 
Hand wash.

name: Polka-dot neck tie blouse
description:
Channel Chloé’s androgynous vibe with this polka-dot neck-tie blouse – a clever mash-up of masculine cut and feminine detailing. We love it as an alternative to the ubiquitous white shirt, especially when teamed with crisp tailoring and a dramatic over-coat. 
This dark burgundy jacquard and white polka-dot print silk blouse has a close fitting round neck with a quilted neck tie detail. 
The blouse has a hidden buttoned centre front fastening and long sleeves with button fastening cuffs.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: A-line wool flannel skirt
description:
Embrace autumnal hues with this wool-flannel skirt from Chloé. Its ladylike silhouette and clean lines evoke a modern femininity. Take a more relaxed approach by teaming yours with flats and a fresh white tee. 
This rust-red wool A-line skirt has a high-waist with two front pockets and a concealed centre-back zip fastening.
95% wool, 3% polyamide, 2% elastane. 
Lining: 70% acetate, 30% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Exclusive Cupid arrow cashmere sweater
description:
If you need a bit of love in your life opt for this cupid arrow sweater from Chinti and Parker. Inspired by neon signage and exclusive to MATCHESFASHION.COM, it’s perfect when paired with 70s style double denim or simple tailoring. 
A navy-blue cashmere sweater with a mint-green and pink cupid arrow intarsia-knit front feature.
The relaxed fitting sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Wool and cashmere polka-dot top
description:
Chloé’s luxurious take on knitwear gets a playful edge with this sleeveless white polka dot top. Crafted from a super-soft wool and cashmere-blend, this sumptuous piece is effortlessly feminine. Style it with an A-line mini and ballet flats.
This dark-brown and white polka dot cropped sweater is sleeveless with a close fitting round-neck.
70% wool, 30% cashmere.
Dry clean.

name: Reversible shearling and leather panel coat
description:
Chloé gets right to the root of autumn dressing with this shearling and leather panel coat – oversized, cosy and unequivocally luxe. Crafted from the softest lambskin and burgundy shearling; you can wear this reversible style two ways for double your investment. 
This black leather coat has a wide collar, a zipped centre front fastening, front patch pockets and long sleeves with burgundy shearling-trimmed cuffs, and front panels. 
The oversized coat is fully reversible and has a burgundy shearling side with black leather panels and cuff trims. 
100% lambskin leather. Lining: 80% wool, 20% polyamide
Specialist leather clean.

name: Polka-dot cashmere and wool-blend cardigan
description:
Chloé keeps covering up chic with this polka-dot cardigan. A cashmere and wool-blend composition makes it a luxurious investment; perfect over a white shirt for an elegant daytime look. 
This dark burgundy and white polka-dot cashmere and wool blend cardigan has a round-neck an open front and long sleeves.
68% wool, 29% cashmere, 3% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Zigzag jacquard trousers
description:
Chloé re-visit their signature ‘70s aesthetic with these zigzag jacquard trousers. Sitting high at the waist and flaring at the knee; they make statement tailoring feel fresh again. Highlight the jacquard print with metallic gold accessories.
These cream, ivory and gold zigzag jacquard trousers have a high-rise, fit slim through the thigh, are cropped to the calf and have a kick-flare from the knee. 
The slim-fit trousers have side pockets, jet back pockets and a white stripe down each leg with a top hook and zip front fastening. 
100% polyester. Lining: 74% acetate, 26% silk. 
Dry clean.

name: Exclusive Bisous cashmere sweater
description:
If you need a bit of love in your life opt for this cupid-arrow sweater from Chinti and Parker. Inspired by neon signage and exclusive to MATCHESFASHION.COM, it’s perfect when paired with 70s style double denim or simple tailoring. 
A grey cashmere sweater with a multicoloured Bisous intarsia-knit chest feature.
The slim fitting sweater has a round-neck and long sleeves with ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.
100% cashmere.
Hand wash.

name: Leather and shearling biker jacket
description:
Beautifully crafted outerwear comes in the form of this light-blue leather and shearling biker jacket from Chloé. Cut to a boxy silhouette in a chic pastel hue, it epitomises the label’s effortless aesthetic. Wear it with everything from modern tailoring to leather leggings and heels.  
This light-blue leather jacket has an asymmetrical front zip fastening and three zipped front pockets on a beige trim with a cream shearling collar and buttoned-down lapels. 
The biker jacket has long sleeves, zipped cuffs, a quilted back hem and two front hem straps with a buckle detail. 
Lambs skin. Lining: 56% cupro, 36% polyester, 5% polyurethane.
Specialist fur clean.

name: Polkadot cashmere and wool-blend cardigan
description:
Chloé apply their Parisian polish to the classic cardigan with this dark-brown polka-dot style. Cut from a sumptuous blend of wool, cashmere and silk, this ladylike piece is the perfect cover up when the weather cools.  
This dark brown and white polka dot cashmere and wool-blend cardigan has a round-neck an open front and long sleeves,
68% wool, 29% cashmere, 3% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Neck tie detail silk blouse
description:
Chloé’s neck tie detail blouse is a chic office to off-duty piece. The pure silk finish and self-tie neck detail adds an elegant twist to a wardrobe staple. Team yours with a tweed skirt and nude pumps for a feminine take on smart dressing. 
This white silk blouse has a close fitting round-neck featuring a quilted self-tie neck detail and a back neck button fastening and keyhole detail. 
This loose fitting blouse has a pleated centre-front column and long sleeves with button fastening cuffs.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Wide lapel double-breasted blazer
description:
Chloé nods to the 60’s with this wide lapel double-breasted blazer. A boxy silhouette and oversized buttons bring a sophisticated dimension to the delicate cream hue. Wear this wool piece buttoned up with a classic blouse and printed trousers for a polished look. 
This cream wool compact-crepe jacket has wide peaked lapels, a double-breasted buttoned front fastening and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. 
The loose-fit blazer has a chest pocket, two large front patch pockets and a single vent. 
100% wool. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Micro-boucle A-line skirt
description:
Chloé take a soft approach to new season tailoring with this micro-boucle skirt. The pastel green hue and subtle A-line silhouette perfectly channels the label’s elegant aesthetic. Wear with a pussy bow blouse and delicate heels for a chic office to evening look. 
This mint-green mini boucle A-line skirt has hidden seam pockets and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
93% wool, 7% polyamide. Lining: 74% acetate, 26% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Grid top embellished ring
description:
This grid top ring from Chloé will lend your looks a high-impact finish. Embellished with glistening Swarovski crystals; wear it solo to let it steal the spotlight. 
This yellow gold metal ring has a wide band and a 3D grid top feature with light-blue Swarovski crystal embellishments.
Metal, Swarovski crystals.

name: Boucle patch-pocket coat
description:
Chloé proves that pastels aren’t just for Spring; cutting their boucle patch-pocket coat from a pistachio-green wool-blend. An A-line silhouette and super-size pockets nod to the ‘60s; embrace the era further and layer over a high-waisted mini skirt. 
This pistachio-green boucle coat has a collar, a concealed-button centre-front fastening, a single vent and long sleeves with two large front patch pockets. 
93% virgin wool, 7% polyamide. Lining: 100% cupro.
Dry clean.

name: Bettina embellished resin ring
description:
Chloé brings a bold metallic accent to your jewellery collection with this Bettina embellished resin ring. A statement cylindrical design sits atop gold metal and a subtle underside engraving will add a sense of hidden luxury to any ensemble.  
This gold metal ring has a cylinder shaped clear resin top feature with a gold strand setting detail.
Metal, resin.

name: Horse head ring
description:
Chloé brings an equestrian influence to jewellery with this horse head ring. A yellow gold metal finish and 3D top feature make it an eye-catching decorative piece. Wear yours solo for ultimate impact. 
This yellow gold metal ring has a logo engraved plain band and a 3D horse head top feature.
Metal.

name: Scalloped edge mesh panel pumps
description:
It’s the finer details that make these black pumps from Chloé a sartorial star. Fusing fierce mesh with luxurious suede, this pair will bring a touch of Parisian polish to office and evening ensembles alike. 
These black suede shoes have a round-toe and a scalloped edge mesh edge panel with a black leather trim. 
The slip-on shoes have a high block heel.
Suede, fabric, leather.

name: Double horse head bracelet
description:
Chloé’s gold metal bangle features a double equestrian-inspired horse head detail. Wear this eye-catching piece with classic looks for a decorative finish. 
This gold metal slip on bangle has a 3D double horse head top feature.
Metal.

name: Scalloped edge flats
description:
Perfecting understated chic, Chloé’s Scalloped-edge flats are a feminine take on a simple style. Deep red suede gives this charming footwear piece an elegant edge, making them the perfect way to add hint of Parisian romance to your look.
These burgundy suede shoes have a round-toe and a scalloped edge. 
The slip-on shoes have a small heel.
Suede.

name: Scalloped edge flats
description:
A luxe flat with uncompromising style, these grey shoes are quintessentially Chloé. Scalloped edges bring a modern feminine allure juxtaposed with delicate suede. A chic investment for any sophisticated woman; wears your everyday with trousers or minis. 
These grey suede shoes have a round-toe and a scalloped edge. 
The slip on shoes have a small heel.
Suede.

name: Bettina embellished rectangular resin ring
description:
Chloé's Bettina embellished resin ring will make an indulgent statement. This towering beauty has a discreet engraving and a bold rectangular clear resin feature that will complete any look with charisma and charm.  
This gold metal ring has a 3D rectangular shaped clear resin top feature with a gold strand setting detail.
Metal, resin.

name: Scalloped edge flats
description:
Every fashion-savvy woman needs a delicate pair of flats, and this forest-green pair from Chloé are perfect for busy city days. Featuring the label’s signature scalloped hem and crafted from luxurious suede, team yours with everything from tailored trousers to girly minis. 
These forest-green suede shoes have a round toe and a scalloped edge. 
The slip on shoes have a small heel.
Suede.

name: Gourmette gold chain and leather bracelet
description:
We love the graphic element of this Chloé bracelet - a chunky style comprised of gold metal links with beige leather intersections. Slip it on to give simple separates a punchy finish. 
This gold-tone large chain bracelet has a beige-leather coated centre detail with a push clasp fastening.
Brass, leather.

name: Leather knee-length boots
description:
Chloé gets set for fall with these leather knee-length boots. A sophisticated style laced with slick Parisian polish, show off this tan pair with a pastel mini skirt and a crisp white shirt. 
These tan leather knee-high boots have an almond-toe, an inside zip fastening and a high stacked block heel.
Leather.

name: Susanna gold-stud suede boots
description:
Chloé’s Susanna boots are a cult classic. This pair sees the house favourite re-worked in soft navy suede, complete with signature stud details and three buckle fastenings. Pair them with everything from skinny denim to floral shift dresses as they’re sure to become a wardrobe staple. 
These navy suede ankle boots are fully embellished with gold studs, have an exposed-zip side fastening and three gold buckled front straps featuring gold metal tips.
The boots have a point-toe and a black Cuban heel with a gold metal trim.
Suede, metal.

name: Stretch leather ankle boots
description:
Ankle boots are perennially chic and those seeking a standout style will love this Chloé pair. Burgundy stretch leather makes a seasonal alternative to black and brings a new dimension to neutral separates. Bring your look together and team it with a co-ordinating holdall.      
These burgundy stretch leather slip-on ankle boots have an almond toe and a block high heel.
Leather.

name: Bernie bi-colour leather ankle boots
description:
Impeccably crafted in Italy, these Bernie leather ankle boots from Chloé have a military-inspired edge. Contrasting brown leather panels and a stacked wooden heel makes them a statement addition to slim-fit trousers or opaque tights.  
These grey leather ankle boots have a brown lace up front, a contrasting brown leather back panel and front strap with side buckle fastening.
The ankle boots have a round-toe and a stacked wooden high block heel.
Leather

name: Leather Chelsea boots
description:
The classic Chelsea boot is a style set favourite, and this leather pair from Chloé is a chic choice. Expertly crafted in Italy, they’ll make a sophisticated addition to skinny jeans and an oversized coat.  
These brown matt-leather flat Chelsea boots have an almond-toe and a small wooden stacked heel. 
The slip on boots have dark-brown elasticated side panels and a back pull tab. 
Leather.

name: Tri-colour fur bag charm
description:
Update your favourite bag with this tri-colour fur charm from Chloé. A neutral palette and sumptuous fur finish make this a sophisticated accessory with a fun edge. 
This black, white and beige circular fox fur bag charm has a gold metal logo engraved lobster claw clasp fastening.
Fox fur, metal.

name: The Emilia calf hair and leather bag
description:
Chloé’s Emilia bag is the perfect route to ladylike dressing. A black and white calf hair body nods to the season’s wild prints, whilst gold hardware accents keep your look polished. Tote it after-hours with tailored separates and classic pumps.  
This black and white printed calf hair clutch bag has an optional gold chain shoulder strap and a hidden button-fastened black leather front flap with gold metal hardware detailing. 
The bag has a black leather lining with one internal slip pocket. 
80% calf hair, 20% calf leather. Lining: 100% lambskin.

name: Leather envelope clutch
description:
Chloé’s envelope clutch is the optimum in elegant accessorising. Carry yours for timeless appeal that will add that extra bit of sophistication to an after-hours look. 
This black grained leather clutch bag has a gold metal edge trim and an envelope front flap with a gold metal logo engraved front clasp fastening. 
The bag has a black fabric lining with one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Marcie medium satchel
description:
Chloé’s Marcie satchel is the perfect everyday companion. Beautifully crafted from beige leather, this spacious tote features gold metal hardware and a loop-through strap fastening. Swing yours over your shoulder for a luxe take on boho chic. 
This light-brown leather tote has a braided edge logo embossed front flapped pocket with a loop-through strap fastening and an under the flap slip-pocket. 
The bag has two wrapped leather top handles, an optional leather shoulder strap, gold metal hardware and a zipped top closure. 
The bag has a khaki fabric lining with one zipped and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Amelia shoulder bag
description:
Chloé’s Amelia shoulder bag will bring clean-cut elegance to your everyday wardrobe. White side panels and gold hardware sit boldly against dark leather, and internal compartments combine practicality with sophisticated style. Carry yours with sleek leather trousers for effortless Parisian chic. 
This leather bag has burgundy front and back panels, white side panels and a black single front flap with a gold metal clasp fastening. 
The bag has an under the flap zipped pocket and a burgundy leather single top handle with gold metal circular side details. 
The bag has a black leather lining with two main compartments and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, leather lining.

name: Marcie satchel
description:
Chloé’s Marcie satchel is a modern classic. This studded light-grey leather version is a refreshing update, complete with internal pouch pockets for all your daily essentials. Swing it from your shoulder with pretty day dresses and bare legs. 
This light-grey grained leather bag has an adjustable shoulder strap, gold-tone metal hardware and a braid-trimmed studded front flap with an embossed-logo detail and a loop-through strap fastening. 
The bag has a front pocket under the flap and a khaki twill lining with one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Amelia tri-colour bag
description:
The star of Chloe’s SS13 campaign, the Amelia bag is a wonderfully classic style that combines traditional leather craftsmanship with contemporary Art Deco touches
This burgundy leather tote bag has white leather base and side-panels and a black leather front-flap with a gold-metal clasp fastening and a single top handle featuring gold-metal hardware. 
The bag has an under-the-flap zipped front pouch-pocket and two black leather-lined main compartments with one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal.

name: Marcie double-handle bag
description:
Chloe gives a fresh new face to its signature carryall with this white Marcie double-handle bag.  Take this covetable accessory with you on weekdays or weekends for a polished finish to your look.  Shown here with 
, 
, 
 and 
.
This light-grey leather tote bag has a top-zip opening and two woven leather top handles with gold metal hardware.
The bag has a large front flapped pocket and centre-front beige exposed-stitch detail with a leather-strap and loop fastening.
The tote bag has one interior zipped pocket and one interior open pocket.
Leather, fabric lining.

name: Marcie medium satchel
description:
Chloé’s Marci medium satchel is a chic everyday accessory. Expertly crafted from blue leather and stamped with flashes of gold hardware, this roomy tote can be worn one of two ways. Carry yours in the crook of your arm or use the detachable strap for a more relaxed look.  
This mid-blue leather tote has a braided edge logo-embossed front flapped pocket with a loop through strap fastening and an under the flap slip-pocket. 
The bag has two wrapped leather top handles, an optional leather shoulder strap, gold metal hardware and a zipped top closure. 
The bag has a khaki fabric lining with one zipped and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Marcie medium satchel bag
description:
A chic everyday piece, Chloé’s medium Marcie satchel is an iconic style. Gold metal studs add a flash of metallic to light-grey leather. Carry this roomy tote by the handle or wear across your body with the optional shoulder strap.
This light-grey leather tote has a braided edge logo embossed gold metal studded front flapped pocket with a loop-through strap fastening and an under the flap slip pocket. 
The bag has two wrapped leather top handles, an optional leather shoulder strap, gold metal hardware and a zipped top closure. 
The bag has a khaki fabric lining with one zipped and one open internal-pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Alice bag
description:
Shipping restrictions apply. If shipping outside EU please contact MyStylist.
