Chloé’s black and brown leather and snake-skin bag will bring a dose of Parisian luxury to your accessories collection. An optional shoulder strap and flashes of gold hardware keep the look sleek and sophisticated; carry yours to accent structured tailoring. 
This black leather bag has chocolate-brown python-skin front and back panels, a button fastening logo embossed flapped front pocket and two leather top handles with gold metal hardware. 
The bag has an optional leather shoulder strap and a zipped top closure. 
The bag has a black fabric lining with one open internal pocket.
Leather, python skin, metal, fabric lining.

name: Marcie satchel
description:
Downsize your daytime tote with this Marcie satchel from Chloé. Gold metal hardware brightens the darkest of navy leathers for a sophisticated finish. Carry this compact style for chic days in the city. 
This black-navy grained leather bag has an adjustable shoulder strap, gold-tone metal hardware and a braid-trimmed studded front flap with an embossed logo detail and a loop-through strap fastening. 
The bag has a front pocket under the flap and a khaki twill lining with one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Marcie satchel
description:
A classic style from Parisian fashion house Chloé, this Marcie satchel is the perfect everyday tote. The blue leather hue is accented with gold metal hardware and a braided front panel. Carry it over your shoulder on busy city days for a hint of sophisticated polish. 
This mid-blue grained-leather bag has an adjustable shoulder strap, gold tone metal hardware and a braid trimmed front flap with an embossed logo detail and a loop through strap fastening. 
The bag has a front pocket under the flap and a khaki twill lining with one zipped internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining

name: Marcie satchel bag
description:
Chloé's Marcie satchel bag will bring Parisian elegance to the simplest outfit. Wear it with skinny coloured denim and an embellished tee to add a sophisticated edge to your daytime wardrobe.
This rust-brown leather bag has an adjustable shoulder strap, gold-tone metal hardware and a braid-trimmed front flap with an embossed-logo detail and a loop-through strap fastening. 
The bag has a front pocket under the flap and a khaki twill lining with one zipped internal pocket.
Calf leather, metal cotton twill lining.

name: Paraty leather bag
description:
Chloé’s Paraty leather bag epitomises the label’s exquisite craftsmanship. Thick piped edging and flashes of gold hardware on beige make this a sophisticated carryall, perfect with tailored shorts and embellished sandals for a romantic Parisian look. 
This beige leather bag has thick piped edge details, a discreet embossed front logo, two top handles and an optional shoulder strap with yellow gold metal hardware. 
The bag has a zipped top closure and a cream fabric lining with one zipped internal pocket and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Marcie medium satchel
description:
Chloé’s iconic Marcie satchel is the perfect size for everyday. Crafted from berry-red leather with gold metal hardware, carry it by the top handle or shrug it over your shoulder for a hint of Parisian polish.  
This berry-red leather tote has a braided edge logo embossed front flapped pocket with a loop through strap fastening and an under the flap slip pocket. 
The bag has two wrapped leather top handles, an optional leather shoulder strap, gold metal hardware and a zipped top closure. 
The bag has a khaki fabric lining with one zipped and one open internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining.

name: Mini Marcie cross-body bag
description:
Every city woman needs a perfect sized tote, Chloé offer this Mini Marcie cross-body bag. Its raspberry-red hue is ideal for the season ahead, so carry yours to bring a pop of colour to muted palettes
This raspberry red grained-leather bag has an adjustable shoulder strap, gold tone metal hardware and a braid trimmed front flap with an embossed logo detail and a loop through strap fastening. 
The bag has a front pocket under the flap and a khaki twill lining with one zipped internal pocket.
Leather, metal, fabric lining

name: Belted crepe dress
description:
Chloé’s Parisian elegance is on full display with this navy crepe dress. Its panelled overlay is accented with silver metal studs and a waist cinching belt. Wear this sophisticated number with pretty courts and an oversized tote. 
This navy crepe dress is sleeveless and has a round-neck with a panelled overlay detailing featuring silver stud buttons. 
The slim-fitting dress has a concealed centre back zip fastening and an attached waist belt with a logo engraved buckle.
55% acetate, 45% viscose. Lining: 70% acetate, 30% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Bridget leather tote
description:
Chloé’s signature carryalls are true modern classics. The Bridget is one of their most pared-back designs, with its clean lines and minimal hardware. This mini red leather version comes with a detachable shoulder strap - perfect for dealing with the demands of busy city life. 
This dark-red leather bag has two top handles, a detachable shoulder strap and a logo-engraved gold metal front plaque with a zipped top closure featuring a logo-engraved gold zipper.
The  bag has a dark-khaki twill lining with two internal slip pockets. 
100% goats skin. Lining: 100% cotton twill.

name: Polka-dot tulle blouse
description:
Give your evening repertoire a dose of Chloé’s Parisian charm with this polka-dot blouse. Sheer-tulle will lend looks an elegant finish; layer it over a white cami for a ladylike alternative to shirting. 
This white polka-dot embroidered sheer-tulle blouse has long sleeves and a concealed centre-front button fastening with a piqué cotton yoke-panel, placket, curved-collar and buttoned cuffs.
The sheer blouse comes with a detachable piqué cotton sleeveless top with a scoop-neck.
94% cotton, 6% elastane. Combo: 50% cotton, 50% polyamide.
Dry clean.

name: Dolly Swarovski crystal platforms
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s iconic Dolly shoe goes extra glam this season, with the designer dipping her signature island platform in Swarovski crystals. Whimsical and surprisingly comfortable, this sparkling style is perfect for party feet.
These black suede shoes have an almond toe, a high heel and a Swarovski crystal-embellished high platform. 
The shoes have a red trimmed sole and a signature gold metal web logo sole detail.
Suede, leather, Swarovski crystals.

name: Dolly signature pumps
description:
Elevate your after hours ensembles in directional chic style with these nude suede Dolly signature pumps from cutting edge footwear designer, Charlotte Olympia. An iconic gold platform detail gives this contemporary-cool pair a fashion-forward appeal; team with elegant dresses to raise your sartorial profile.
These nude-pink suede shoes have an almond toe and high-heel with a metallic-gold high platform with a red trimmed leather sole. 
The signature shoes have a gold-tone spider web logo sole detail.
Calfskin.

name: Aries zodiac Pandora clutch
description:
For the girl whose bag holds her charms and her secrets, Charlotte Olympia presents this Pandora clutch. The zodiac Ram sits decadently on the front with twinkling Swarovski crystals fulfilling the high expectations of an Aries.
This red Perspex box clutch bag has gold-metal edges, a magnetic closure and a star-studded base.
The bag features a purple and pink enamel, Swarovski crystal and gold-metal embellished Aries star-sign centre-front detail.
The bag has a metallic-gold canvas optional internal-pouch with a zipped top closure and a signature gold-metal spider-web zipper.
Perspex, metal, enamel, crystals, canvas

name: Dolly signature pumps
description:
Turn your sartorial volume up to eleven in these fashion-forward black Dolly signature pumps by front row-favourite designer, Charlotte Olympia. A dramatic gold platform brings a high-voltage update to a timeless design; wear with everything from slim-leg denim to coquettish dresses for a tough-luxe finish.
These black suede shoes have an almond toe and high-heel with a metallic-gold high platform with a red trimmed leather sole.
The signature shoes have a gold-tone spider web logo sole detail.
Lambskin.

name: Sagittarius zodiac Pandora clutch
description:
Bold colour and elaborate detail make this Charlotte Olympia Pandora a must-have piece for the high-fashion Sagittarius. 
This yellow perspex box clutch bag has gold-metal edges, a magnetic closure and a star-studded base. 
The bag features a red and green enamel, Swarovski crystal and gold-metal embellished Sagittarius star-sign centre-front detail. 
The bag has a metallic-gold canvas optional internal-pouch with a zipped top closure and a signature gold-metal spider-web zipper.
Perspex, metal, enamel, crystals, canvas

name: Taurus zodiac Pandora clutch
description:
Showcase the strong character of the Taurus with Charlotte Olympia’s Pandora clutch. The ultimate after-dark accessory, this creation is loaded with fiercely unique appeal. 
This dark brown Perspex box clutch bag has gold metal edges, a magnetic closure and a star-studded base. 
The bag features a gold metal, coral and red enamel Swarovski crystal embellished Taurus star sign centre-front detail. The bag has a metallic gold canvas optional internal pouch with a zipped top closure and a signature gold metal spider web zipper.
Perspex, metal, enamel, crystals, canvas.

name: Pandora perspex box clutch
description:
Make style-savvy women everywhere green with envy by investing in this cute emerald Pandora box clutch from Charlotte Olympia.  Working reveal/conceal in a transparent perspex finish, this streamlined accessory will show-off your covetable fashion credentials.
This green perspex box clutch has a magnetic closure with a gold metal and clear crystal top clasp detail. 
The bag has a metallic-gold pouch featuring a zipped top closure, a signature gold metal web zipper and a can be seen through the perspex box clutch. 
Perspex, cotton, crystal, metal.

name: Aries Birthday shoes
description:
Bold and charismatic, these Aries shoes from Charlotte Olympia are not for the faint-hearted. Star-sign embellishment and Swarovski crystals gleam, giving them a lust-worthy edge.
These brick-red suede shoes have an almond toe and a heart shaped front panel with a gold-metal and purple enamel Swarovski crystal embellished aries star sign front detail. 
The slip-on shoes have a metallic gold leather piped edge trim and a metallic gold leather small heel.
Suede, leather, metal, enamel, crystal.

name: Pandora perspex box clutch
description:
Box clutches are a sleek must for after-hours, and this red Pandora version from fashion-insider favourite designer Charlotte Olympia is a key piece to carry this season.  Finished with a crystal-embellished spider clasp, this is eccentric-chic at its absolute pinnacle.
This red perspex box clutch has a magnetic closure with a gold metal and clear crystal top clasp detail. 
The bag has a metallic-gold pouch featuring a zipped top closure, a signature gold metal web zipper and a can be seen through the perspex box clutch. 
Perspex, cotton, crystal, metal.

name: Pandora box clutch
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s black Pandora clutch is an irresistible accessory for the girl with an eye for detail.  Featuring the labels signature spider clasp encrusted with Swarovski crystals, this high-shine piece is the perfect companion come cocktail hour.
This black high-shine plastic box clutch bag has a magnetic closure with a gold metal clear Swarovski crystal-embellished spider clasp detail featuring red crystal eye embellishments. 
The bag has a metallic-gold fabric optional internal pouch with a zipped top pouch and a signature gold metal web zipper detail.
Plastic, metal, fabric.

name: Kitty embroidered pumps
description:
Capturing Charlotte Olympia’s signature Kitty motif and teaming it with a sophisticated heel, these black velvet shoes will make a charming addition to your footwear collection. Embroidered with a gold cats face and pointy ears, wear yours with polished looks for a hint of off-beat charm. 
These black velvet shoes have a round-toe with a gold embroidered kitty face feature and pointed ears with a black patent leather edge trim. 
The slip on shoes have a black patent high heel and a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Velvet, leather.

name: Desiree silk-twill pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia seamlessly combines elegance and British quirk with these ivory silk-twill Desiree pumps. A tulle pompom detail and mid heel make them a fabulous way to sashay down the aisle. Complete your look with the additional hold-ups to add a subtle something blue. 
An ivory silk-twill shoe with a point-toe and an ivory leather mid-high heel. 
The slip on shoes have an ivory leather pinked edge detail with an ivory tulle pompom front. 
The shoes come with 15 denier nude hold-ups featuring a light-blue back seam, a spider web detail and a light-blue lace top edge. 
In addition the shoes come with heart shaped logo embroidered shoe cushions featuring pink bows.
Silk twill, calf leather, tulle. Hold-ups: 91% nylon, 9% lycra.
Hand wash hold-ups.

name: Charlotte's Web velvet slippers
description:
Casting her enchanting Charlotte’s web over the decadent slippers, this red pair from Charlotte Olympia will anchor every look with the label’s whimsical allure. Crafted from luxurious velvet, wear with everyday denim for a tactile finishing touch. 
These red velvet flat shoes have a round-toe, red grosgrain trimmed edges and a gold embroidered spider's web front detail. 
The slipper style shoes have a small gold leather heel and a signature gold metal spider's web sole detail.
Velvet, calf leather.

name: Ted satin shoulder bag
description:
Once upon a time there was a Charlotte Olympia bag we just couldn’t resist. The plush satin Ted bag is made up of black crystal eyes and a velvet tipped nose. This little chap offers up plenty of room for the ‘bear’ necessities – slip its chain strap over cocktail dresses and you’re set. 
This teal-blue satin teddy head bag has pink satin ears and nose with black crystal eyes and a velvet tipped nose. 
The shoulder bag has a detachable gold-chain shoulder strap and a zipped back closure with a signature spider's web zipper. 
Satin, metal, crystal, velvet, satin lining.

name: Capri Kitty slippers
description:
The Charlotte Olympia Kitty flat has become somewhat of a mascot for the brand. Perfectly summing up the label’s whimsical, feminine charm; this velvet pair stands apart amongst an array of imitations.
These navy-blue velvet flat shoes have a round-toe and an embroidered cat face and ears with navy grosgrain trimmed edges. 
The shoes have a blue fabric and embroidered detailed sole.
Velvet.
Country of origin: Italy.

name: Velvet Kitty slippers
description:
A to-sigh-for classic from Charlotte Olympia, the Kitty flats have gained a cult classic following amongst footwear aficionados the world over.  Imagined in decadent and sophisticated black velvet, wear yours to bring an irreverent humour to your Le Smoking style.
These black velvet flat shoes have a round-toe and black patent leather trimmed edge with a gold embroidered cat face front detail. 
The shoes have a metallic-gold patent leather small heel and a signature gold metal logo sole detail.
Velvet, leather.

name: Cindy suede platform high heel pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia characterises these nude Cindy pumps with her towering signature platform. Artfully texture clashing leather and suede, wear yours with a playful mini for leg-lengthening effect. 
These nude suede shoes have an almond-toe, a high stiletto heel and a metallic gold leather island high platform. 
The slip on shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, leather.

name: Take Pandora clutch
description:
As Charlotte Olympia’s handbag collection continues to grow so does her witty charm, this Take clutch embodies her love of old Hollywood glamour with an irreverent sense of humour. 
This black Perspex box clutch bag a features a white clapper board style engraved front and a white chevron patterned top opening with a hinged opening and magnetic closure. 
The bag has an optional metallic gold fabric pouch with a zipped top closure featuring a signature gold metal web zipper.
Perspex, fabric.

name: Velvet kitty slippers
description:
Charlotte Olympia adds a playful twist to this seasons must-have slipper style with these navy velvet Kitty flats. The rich hue and tactile finish make them the perfect partner to love-worn denim on off-duty days. 
These navy-blue velvet flat shoes have a round-toe and black patent leather trimmed edge with a gold embroidered cat face front detail.
The shoes have a metallic-gold patent leather small heel and a signature gold metal logo sole detail.
Velvet, leather.

name: Box office Pandora clutch
description:
Channel Hollywood glamour with Charlotte Olympia’s Box office clutch. A light-hearted design loaded with charisma and charm, this is the missing piece of your accessory jigsaw.
Channel Hollywood glamour with Charlotte Olympia’s Box office clutch. A light-hearted design loaded with charisma and charm, this is the missing piece of your accessory jigsaw. 
This clear Perspex box clutch bag has a magnet fastening closure and gold metal film-reel style edges and panel details. 
The bag has a metallic gold fabric zipped top optional internal pouch.
Metal, Perspex, fabric.

name: Velvet kitty slippers
description:
Channel Charlotte Olympia’s irresistible quirk with these Kitty shoes. Sumptuous green velvet and flashes of metallic gold give this recognisable style an elegant edge. Wear yours with jeans and skirts alike to add a whimsical twist to your off-duty wardrobe. 
These bottle-green velvet flat shoes have a round-toe and black patent leather trimmed edge with a gold embroidered cat face front detail. 
The shoes have a metallic gold patent leather small heel and a signature gold metal logo sole detail.
Velvet, leather.

name: Debbie suede pumps
description:
Make a towering statement in Charlotte Olympia’s Debbie suede pumps. Instantly enlivening any look with a bold red hue and contrasting high-shine leather platform, wear yours with monochrome graphics to let your feet do the talking.  
These red suede shoes have a point-toe, a high stiletto heel and a metallic gold leather island platform. 
The slip on shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, leather.

name: Mansfield metallic sandals
description:
Fierce metallic leopard-print make these leather Mansfield sandals a fabulous new season investment. Guaranteed to make a statement, slip them on with a rich-hued dress for maximum impact.
These leopard print metallic-gold leather sandals have a peep-toe and a knotted front strap with a matching wrap-around side buckle fastening ankle strap. 
The shoes have a high block heel and a platform.
Leather.

name: Mirror Mirror Box clutch
description:
The fairest clutch in all the land; Charlotte Olympia’s Mirror Mirror bag conveys her witty approach to accessory design. A princess-like addition to your ensemble that is sure to secure spotlight status whatever the occasion.  
This black plastic box clutch bag has a magnet fastening closure and a mirror front panel with pearl embellished edges. 
The bag has a metallic gold fabric internal pouch with a zipped top closure.
Plastic, fabric pouch.

name: Ursula metallic leather strappy sandals
description:
Lending an elegant nod to the golden age of Hollywood, these Ursula sandals from Charlotte Olympia are fabulous way to embrace sparkling metallics. A lattice front and double ankle straps bring a sophisticated decoration to your feet, show them off to full effect with cropped trousers. 
These gold metallic leather sandals have a peep toe, a lattice front motif and a double ankle strap with a double buckle side fastening. 
The shoes have a high platform, a high stiletto heel and a signature gold metal spider web sole detail. 
Nappa leather.

name: Mae West sandals
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s glamorous aesthetic transpires to these Mae West sandals. A clever incorporation of the namesake’s womanly silhouette makes these the ultimate in feminine footwear. Show yours off in a mini skirt to let your feet do the talking. 
These nude satin shoes have a peep-toe and a gold embroidered Mae West figure T-bar front with red lips and a pearl embellished necklace. 
The shoes have a side buckle fastening wrap around ankle strap and a high stiletto heel with a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Fabric.

name: Margherita metallic leather sandals
description:
Beautifully intricate, these Margherita sandals from Charlotte Olympia juxtapose the delicate elegance of cut out floral leather with a metallic platinum finish. These stunning sandals come with 15 denier nude hold ups and are the go to choice for any timelessly romantic outfit.
These metallic platinum leather sandals have a peep-toe and a floral, swirl and heart cut-out front and heel panel with a double side-buckle fastening ankle strap. The shoes have a mid-high stiletto heel.
 The shoes come with 15 denier nude hold-ups featuring a light-blue back seam, a spider web detail and a light-blue lace top edge. In addition, the shoes come with heart-shaped logo embroidered shoe cushions featuring pink bows. 
Leather. Hold Ups: 91% nylon, 9% lycra.

name: Such a Hoot slippers
description:
These Such A Hoot slippers are given character in the form of a gold and gunmetal leather owl face courtesy of Charlotte Olympia. Make them your go-to flats this season and pair them with everything from skirts to skinny jeans.
These black suede flat shoes have a round toe and a gold and gunmetal leather owl face front detail with pinked edges.
The slip-on shoes have a metallic gold leather small block heel.
Leather.

name: Sleeping Kitty slippers
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s whimsical Kitty slippers are a neo cult classic. This glittery black pair sees her signature style take a cat nap and make an eccentric alternative to ballet flats this season. 
These black and gold-glitter laser-cut hair textured shoes have a gold piped edge and a gold embroidered sleeping kitty face front detail. 
The slipper-style shoes have a gold-leather small block heel. 
Suede, calf leather

name: Such a Hoot slippers
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s whimsical designs never fail to make us smile. A riff on her signature Kitty styles; this metallic-gold owl-inspired pair make a chic alternative to heels. 
These metallic gold and grey feather printed leather flat shoes have a round toe and a silver and gold leather owl face front detail with pinked edges.
The slip-on shoes have a metallic gold leather small block heel.
Leather.

name: Take 85 metallic leather sandals
description:
Charlotte Olympia takes a typically tongue-in-cheek approach to footwear with these Take 85 metallic leather sandals. Silver film reel straps bring a fabulously modern edge to old Hollywood glamour; steal the spotlight at your next event by teaming these with a figure hugging LBD. 
These metallic silver leather sandals have an open-toe and a film reel style crossed over front with a matching wrap around side buckle fastening ankle strap.
Leather.

name: Embroidered Kitty slippers
description:
Instantly recognisable as a Charlotte Olympia creation, these black fabric Kitty shoes are a playful investment for Spring. An off-beat twist on this season’s must-have slipper style, wear yours round-the-clock for a touch of quirky-cool flair. 
These black fabric flat shoes have a round-toe with a gold cross-stitch embroidered cat front detail. 
The shoes have black grosgrain trimmed edges and a small gold heel.
Fabric.
Country of origin: Italy.

name: Walk of Fame clutch
description:
Inspired by Hollywood’s Walk of Fame, Charlotte Olympia emblazons this blue speckled bag with her very own star. A thin gold strap allows you to carry this quirky piece over your shoulder or in your hand. A must-have for your next high-profile event.
This mid-blue speckled plastic box shoulder bag features a gold metal trimmed pink plastic 'Walk of fame' centre front star with an embossed gold logo and a circular shoe detail. 
The bag has a gold metal chain shoulder strap and a drawer style compartment with hinged clip fastenings. 
Plastic, metal.

name: Decodent sandals
description:
In truly fabulous Charlotte Olympia style, these Decodent sandals combine a high-shine metallic finish and a towering heel for show-stopping effect. Giving any after-dark look a futuristic finish, team yours with a black ensemble to turn heads at your next event. 
These metallic leather sandals have a peep-toe and a silver, gunmetal and rose gold multi 'Deco' style front with a matching rose-gold side buckle fastening wrap around ankle strap. 
The shoes have a gunmetal high stiletto heel and a silver island platform with a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Leather.

name: Kiss Me Quick suede pumps
description:
Create your own fairytale ending with these Kiss Me Quick suede shoes from Charlotte Olympia. We love the 3D enamel crowned frog. Wear them to add a quirky finishing touch to your outfit. 
These navy-blue suede shoes have a square toe and a gold metal plaque detail with a 3D green, red and gold enamel frog detail.
The slip on shoes have navy-blue grosgrain trimmed edges and a stacked wooden mid-high block heel.
Suede, metal, enamel, wood.

name: Paparazzi pumps
description:
There’s an old Hollywood glamour to these Paparazzi pumps from Charlotte Olympia. Embellished with dazzling Swarovski crystals and the label’s signature high island platform; for full effect wear this sparkling pair with a classic LBD and a subtle black clutch. 
These nude suede shoes have an almond-toe and Swarovski crystal embellished panels with a high stiletto heel and a high island platform. 
The slip on shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, Swarovski crystals.

name: Sleeping Kitty slippers
description:
These Sleeping Kitty slippers from Charlotte Olympia will make a charming addition to your footwear collection. Nude velvet keeps the look versatile; perfect with skinny jeans for stylish weekends in the city. 
These nude velvet slippers have a round-toe and a black embroidered sleeping kitty face front feature.
The slip-on shoes have black patent leather edges and a patent leather small heel.
Velvet, leather.

name: Showtime! Mirrored heel sandals
description:
Laced with notions of vintage Hollywood glamour, Charlotte Olympia’s Showtime! sandals are a must-have for your next fabulous event. Mirrored glass heels and a satin finish make for a show-stopping evening look. Wear yours with your favourite LBD for spotlight-ready style. 
These black satin shoes have a peep-toe and a knotted front strap with a side buckle fastening wrap around ankle strap. 
The shoes have a mirror panel high heel and a black satin high island platform.
Satin, glass.

name: Paparazzi pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia gives the classic black stiletto her signature glamorous Hollywood makeover with this sparkling pair. Encrusted with dazzling Swarovski crystals, these shoes are sure to catch the Paparazzi’s attention when teamed with a seductive LBD. 
These black suede shoes have an almond-toe and Swarovski crystal embellished panels with a high stiletto heel and a high island platform. 
The slip on shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, Swarovski crystals.

name: Spectator Dolly leather pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia puts a modern spin on vintage Hollywood with these Spectator Dolly pumps. A block platform and monochrome brogue pattern bring a bold edge to a classic shape. Wear yours with clashing prints to make a fierce impact after dark.   
These cream leather shoes have an almond-toe featuring a brogue style black front panel with wing tip detailing and a matching back heel panel. 
The shoes have a high black stiletto heel and a high island platform with a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Leather.

name: Rising star sandals
description:
Let Charlotte Olympia’s Rising star sandals complete your evening look with a definitive wow-factor. A smattering of Swarovski crystals upon gold make for the ultimate in high-shine allure. Wear yours with an all-black ensemble for movie star style. 
These black suede sandals have a peep-toe and a five strap front with a double strap side buckle fastening ankle strap. 
The shoes have a metallic gold high block heel and island platform fully embellished with Swarovski crystal stars. 
The shoes have a signature gold metal web sole detail.
Suede, leather, Swarovski crystals.

name: Marry me Pandora clutch
description:
Charlotte Olympia does bridal-chic with her ‘Marry me’ clutch. Interchangeable pouches, featuring a fierce animal-print, a quirky slogan and feminine lace mean that this playful piece will have you feeling like the bride at your next event. 
This clear Perspex box clutch has a magnetic closure with a silver metal crystal embellished engagement ring clasp detail. 
The bag comes with three removable optional fabric pouches, either of which can be worn at one time and can be seen through the Perspex box clutch. 
One pouch features a light-blue satin 'Just married!' slogan embroidered front detail, another is ivory lace and the third is beige, black and brown leopard print calf skin, all pouches have a zipped top closure with a signature gold metal web zipper.
Perspex, fabric, metal.

name: Silverscreen clutch
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s quirky aesthetic transpires to this Silverscreen clutch. A charismatic addition to any ensemble, this is an eye-catching piece with witty charm. 
This multicoloured 'Screen print' magazine style clutch bag has a fishnet embroidered texture and gold metal edges with a magnet fastening top closure.
The bag has a nude-pink satin lining with one open internal pocket and one zipped internal pocket.
Fabric, metal, fabric lining.

name: Happily Ever After clutch
description:
Charlotte Olympia's clutch bags are quickly becoming cult classics. Take inspiration from street style stars and carry this Perspex style to add direction to daywear. 
A pink perspex book-style clutch bag with a gold 'Happily Ever After' engraved detailing.
The box clutch bag has a drawer-style compartment featuring a gold-metal and crystal book worm clasp with swivel clip closure.
Perspex, metal.

name: Owl shoulder bag
description:
This owl shoulder bag will lend your looks a generous dose of Charlotte Olympia’s quirk. Crystal eye embellishments add a touch of sparkle to the charming design. Carry it day or night as a fun way to accessorise. 
This light-pink leather owl shaped bag has blush-pink ribbed suede and gold embossed leather panelling with silk embroidered, black patent-leather and clear crystal eyes. 
The shoulder bag has a long gold chain strap, a zipped top closure and a pink satin lining.
Leather, suede, crystal, metal.

name: Gretel wedge ankle boots
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s fall collection was inspired by fairytales, and these Gretel wedge ankle boots are one for the wish-list. Laser-cut leather creates a cute sock so there is no need for your own; simply add a girly dress and you’ll be sure to find your prince. 
These black patent leather shoes have an almond toe and two front strap details with a cream leather laser cut sock style panel featuring a scalloped top edge.
The shoes have an inside ankle zipped fastening and a high wedge heel with a platform.
Leather.

name: Eleanor suede point-toe pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia adds a touch of sparkle to these glamorous red suede Eleanor point-toe shoes with a gold-metal crystal embellishment. Let them take centre-stage and pair them with your favourite LBD. 
These red suede shoes have a point-toe and a gold metal crystal embellished front buckle detail.
The slip-on shoes have a mid-high stiletto heel.
Suede, metal, crystals.

name: Aurora sandals
description:
Charlotte Olympia is fashion’s favourite storyteller, taking inspiration from childhood fairytales for these Aurora sandals. Crafted using black floral embroidery and embellished with crystals, they make a charming partner to the season’s new ladylike silhouettes. 
These black embroidered flower shoes are fully embellished with black crystals and have an almond toe with black velvet trimmed edges.
The sandals have a sling back heel, a velvet side buckle fastening ankle strap, a high stiletto heel and a high velvet platform.
Fabric, crystals.

name: Bear Necessities point-toe pumps
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s witty aesthetic is evident in these Bear Necessities point-toe pumps. Pink and burgundy floral-print satin with a 3D quilted bear make them a playful investment. Let them steal the spotlight and team with your favourite LBD.
These burgundy and pink floral print satin shoes have a point toe with a 3D quilted bear front feature.
The slip-on shoes have a high stiletto heel.
Fabric.

name: Acorn suede platform pumps
description:
Impeccable attention to detail makes these Acorn shoes from Charlotte Olympia a quirky choice for the new season. The brown wooden heels are carved with a whimsical leaf pattern. Team yours with everything from patterned skirts to smart shirts for a playful edge. 
These moss-green suede shoes have an almond-toe and brown leather trimmed edges with a brown leather self tie bow front detail.
The slip-on shoes have a high wooden island platform and a carved leaf texture high-heel.
Suede, wood, leather.

name: Alice shoe boots
description:
Evoke Charlotte Olympia’s siren-inspired sensibility with these leopard-print shoe boots. Crafted from calf-hair for that wonderful, textured finish – this towering pair nod to the designer’s own, imitable retro style whilst slotting effortlessly into the modern wardrobe.
These black and oak-brown animal print calf-hair ankle boots have an almond-toe and a lace-up front with gold metal tipped black leather laces. 
The boots have a high leather heel, a concealed platform and a signature gold metal sole detail.
Calf-hair, leather.
Country of Origin: Italy.

name: Florian suede shoe boots
description:
Charlotte Olympia’s fairytale inspiration is evident with these Florian shoe boots. A classic style is finished with a gold leaves and a playful lace up front. Be sure to show yours off in pretty dresses. 
These black suede ankle boots have an almond-toe, a gold leather leaf shaped front panel and a black lace up front with gold metal tipped black laces. 
These shoes have a concealed platform and a high heel. 
Suede, calf leather

name: Bear With Me high heel sandals
Sweet dreams kitty slippers and eye mask set
description:
Sleep tight with Charlotte Olympia’s sweet dreams eye mask. The matching red satin slippers are embroidered with a playful kitty face and are guaranteed to keep your feet warm on cold days. This charming set makes the perfect gift.
A red satin set of slippers and a sleeping mask in a matching logo embroidered bag.
The set includes slippers with a round toe, a gold embroidered sleeping kitty front feature, gold embroidered 'Z' side details and suede soles.
The matching eye mask features pointed embroidered ears, closed embroidered eyes and an elasticated head band.
The bag has a gold embroidered centre front logo and a zipped top closure with a signature gold metal zipper detail.
Satin, leather, suede sole.

name: Checkerboard-print shirt
description:
Channel YMC’s tomboy aesthetic with this checkerboard-print shirt. Made from soft, breathable cotton, this button-up style is a versatile addition to your off-duty wardrobe.  
This white and black checkerboard-print shirt has a point-collar, a buttoned centre front fastening, a chest pocket and long sleeves with button fastening cuffs.
100% cotton.
Machine wash.

name: Susie pleated dress
description:
Beautifully crafted from a comfortable stretch-cotton, this Susie pleated dress from YMC is a timeless new season piece. A waist-defining leopard-print belt adds helps accentuate the voluminous skirt. Elevate the look for evening with sky-high heels. 
This black stretch-cady dress has a small high-neck collar, 3/4 length sleeves and turn-up cuffs with a concealed centre-back zip fastening. 
The dress is fitted to the waist and has a full-pleated knee-length skirt with side pockets.
The dress comes with an optional leopard-print calf-hair waist belt. 
69% polyamide, 25% cotton, 6% elastane. Lining: 94% polyester, 6% elastane.
Dry clean.

name: The Impressor bikini
description:
The style-set turn to We Are Handsome for bold swimwear and its clear to see why with this The Impressor bikini. Classic charcoal-grey briefs are printed with a fierce lion on the back while the top is finished with gunmetal toggle ends. Take yours to the beach with the matching cover-up for a statement look. 
This bikini has a charcoal-grey top with soft triangle cups and a self tie fastening halterneck and back strap featuring logo engraved gunmetal toggle ends. 
The matching bikini briefs have self tie side fastenings and a grey-tones Impressor lion back print.
80% polyester, 20% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Serenity beanie hat
description:
Finished with a fur pompom, this Serenity beanie hat from Woolrich is a playful winter warmer. Crafted in Italy from pure wool, its bright-red hue is a great way to add colour to cold weather outfits.
This red wool ribbed knit beanie hat has a turn up hem and a brown fox fur bobble embellishment.
100% wool. Trim: 100% fox fur.
Dry clean.

name: Nude satin-touch tights
description:
Create a flawless finish with these nude satin-touch tights by Wolford.  A wardrobe staple, you’ll find yourself reaching for these again and again.
Nude 20 denier tights.  
85% nylon, 14% elastane, 1% cotton.  
Machine wash.

name: Fur gilet
description:
Yves Salomon’s fur gilet is the perfect transeasonal piece. Tonal brown hues are sure to brighten up dark outfits for a striking finish. Wear yours open over a silk blouse in fall, switching to cashmere knits when the cold sets in. 
A light-brown tonal rabbit fur gilet with a waterfall front and long front hem.
100% rabbit fur.
Specialist fur clean.

name: Silhouette cocktail dress
description:
This Vivienne Westwood Gold Label dress is a flawless cocktail option with typically iconic design features. Elegant, demure and directional, this piece is a must-have for the most sophisticated of occasions. 
This black silk fitted sleeveless dress has twisted detail shoulder straps and a boned structured top with gathered cups and an internal and external zipped centre back fastening. 
The dress has a fitted knee-length pencil skirt with front pockets and a centre back slit detail.
100% silk. Lining: 100% silk.
Dry clean.
Country of Origin: Italy.

name: Double V-neck silk dress
description:
Vince epitomise effortless chic with this double V-neck dress. Sumptuous silk creates a relaxed silhouette helping you channel the label’s laidback Californian aesthetic. 
This navy-blue silk loose fitting shift dress has a V front and back neck and capped sleeves. 
The short dress drapes loosely over the body and easily slips on.
95% silk, 5% spandex.
Dry clean.

name: Linen long-sleeve T-shirt
description:
A basic tee with timeless appeal, this simple Vince top has wear-with-anything appeal and carries a throw-on-and-go vibe.   
This white linen-jersey T-shirt has a round neck, long-sleeves, a chest patch-pocket and a rounded hem.
100% linen.
Hand wash.
Country of Origin: China.

name: Zigote sweater
description:
A timeless sartorial staple, Weekend by MaxMara take a relaxed approach to off-duty dressing with this Zigote sweater. A beige and black colour palette keep striping sophisticated and versatile. Wear yours with dark denim for a casual-cool weekend look. 
This beige and black stripe-print sweater has a boat-neck and long sleeves with a ribbed knit trimmed neckline, hem and cuffs.
72% viscose, 28% polyester.
Hand wash.

name: The Western blouse
description:
Veronica Beard reinvents the classic blouse with this printed Western design. A crossover back detail is sure to add interest to your everyday looks; wear it best with cropped denim and soaring heels. 
This burgundy, orange and purple repeat-print silk shirt has a point collar, a buttoned centre-front fastening and long sleeves with button fastening cuffs. 
The loose fitting blouse has buttoned chest pockets and a crossover back with a chevron hem cut out detail.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Chain-print silk bomber jacket
description:
Embrace Versus’ fearless approach to street-wear with this chain-print bomber jacket. Guaranteed to make a statement, work the look from head-to-toe with clashing prints and fierce urban footwear. 
This white silk collarless bomber jacket features a black and gold signature chain placement print with a buttoned centre-front fastening and a gold metal logo-embossed button detail. 
The relaxed fit jacket has front pockets and long sleeves with a ribbed knit cuff and neckline trim.
100% silk. Trim: 96% rayon, 4% elastane.
Dry clean.

name: Frisco cardigan
description:
Weekend by MaxMara’s silk-blend Frisco cardigan is a relaxed off-duty style with a luxurious edge. Wear yours with leather leggings or skinny denim and glamorous summer sandals for an effortlessly cool daytime look.
This beige cotton-silk knit cardigan has a V-neck and long sleeves with a buttoned-down centre-front fastening.
The long relaxed-fitting cardigan has two front patch pockets. 
55% silk, 45% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: High-neck shoulder slit dress
description:
'Provocative, daring and fearless,' are the words Donatella Versace used to sum up this collaboration between Versus X J.W. Anderson. This black jersey-knit dress has a high neck, but a short hemline and shoulder slit detail that sums up the aesthetic perfectly. Add mesh pumps and a metallic clutch for a look that’s pure rock ‘n’ roll. 
This black jersey-knit dress has a high-neck and long sleeves and features a shoulder slit at one side.
The slim fitting style has a ribbed-knit neckline, hem and cuffs.
72% viscose, 28% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Stretch-cady tailored jacket
description:
Showcasing her talent of ultimately flattering the female form, this black blazer is undeniably Vivienne Westwood Red Label. An artfully draped collar and subtle peplum silhouette make this unique style perfect for work or play. Wear yours in the office with tailored trousers or at the weekend with denim jeans and heels.
This black stretch-cady blazer is collarless, has shawl lapels and an asymmetrical three button centre front fastening. 
The slim-fitting jacket has two flapped faux pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. 
78% acetate, 21% viscose, 1% elastane. Lining: 67% acetate, 33% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Geometric-print T-shirt
description:
Versus gives the statement tee a graphic makeover with this geometric-print style. The bold black and blue pattern is sure to get you noticed. Team it with skinny black trousers and chunky biker boots to channel the labels dynamic aesthetic.
This black and blue cotton-jersey T-shirt has an all-over printed geometric logo print with a round neck and short sleeves.
96% cotton 4% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Geometric-print T-shirt
description:
Defined by their graphic aesthetic, Versace stay true to form with this geometric-print T-shirt. Transform off-duty looks and layer this psychedelic style over skinny black denim. 
This black and white cotton-jersey T-shirt has an all-over geometric logo print with a round neck and short sleeves.
96% cotton 4% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Bon Voyage T-shirt
description:
Wildfox keep off-duty dressing carefree with this Bon Voyage tee. A zesty orange colour and distressed edging channels the brands L.A.-cool aesthetic. Wear yours with printed trousers or cut-off denim for a youthful downtime look. 
This light-orange cotton jersey T-shirt features a white 'Bon Voyage' centre-front print with capped sleeves and a distressed trimmed round-neck.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Buttoned collar poplin shirt
description:
Opt for masculine-inspired tailoring with this cotton poplin shirt by Vivienne Westwood Red Label. The crisp, clean lines are finished off with the label’s signature three button collar and embroidered orb logo. Keep the look androgynous with super-skinny jeans and a peacoat. 
This white cotton-poplin skirt has a large buttoned down collar, a buttoned centre front fastening and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. 
The fitted skirt has a logo embroidered chest detail. 
75% cotton, 23% polyamide, 2% elastane.
Machine wash.

name: Striped boucle wool jacket
description:
Earn your stripes in this boucle wool jacket from Vivienne Westwood Red Label. The eclectic colourway is typical of the British label’s quirky style, tone it down with jeans and boots in the day. 
This burgundy and teal-blue wool boucle jacket has a wide collar, long sleeves and two front pockets with an off-centre logo engraved button front fastening.
The box-cut coat has a pleated back seam detail.
74% wool, 10% nylon, 8% alpaca, 8% mohair. Lining: 100% viscose.
Dry clean.

name: Tartan wool tailored trousers
description:
Embrace the punk spirit of Vivienne Westwood Red Label with these green and blue tartan trousers. Beautifully tailored from pure wool, wear this sleek pair with a white shirt and simple pumps for a cool daytime look. 
Green, black and blue tartan-print wool trousers with a high-rise, straight-leg and cropped to the ankle. 
The tailored trousers have slanted side pockets and two back pockets with a top button and zip front fastening.
100% wool.
Dry clean.

name: Cayman tie-dye bikini briefs
description:
Capturing Summer’s free-spirited vibe, these Cayman tie-dye bikini briefs from ViX have us excited for our next glamorous get-away. Pair with the matching top for an effortless beach to bar combination. 
These indigo-blue and white tie-dye bikini briefs have a Brazilian cut, a turn down top edge and a gold metal logo disc back detail with logo engraved gold metal sliding tubes on each side for adjustable coverage. 
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.
Country of Origin: Brazil.

name: Cayman bia tie-dye bikini top
description:
Fast track your way to poolside glamour with this exotic ViX bikini top. Deep blue hues keep the look elegant whilst subtle tie-dye effects add a playful, Summertime vibe. 
This indigo-blue and white tie-dye bikini top has triangle cups and removable light padding with a self-fastening halterneck and back strap. 
The bikini top has logo engraved gold metal sliding tubes for adjustable coverage.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Pan-print drape dress
description:
Inspired by 18th Century interiors, this Pan-print dress from Vivienne Westwood Red Label will make an artistic addition to your wardrobe. Keep your look modern and team this silk piece with metallic heels for a fabulous mix of old and new. 
This cream, white, black and brown printed silk dress has a cowl-neck, a draped front and 3/4 sleeves with an A-symmetrical hem. 
The fitted dress has a side zip fastening.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: St.Martin printed kaftan
description:
Vix are the unrivalled masters of beach-to-bar dressing, and this St. Martin kaftan is perfect for your next far-flung adventure. Slip on over your bikini for an exotic poolside look.  
This multicoloured printed sheer kaftan has a boat-neck, a deep centre front V slit and a neck tie with gold toggle ends. 
The loose fitting slip on cover-up has batwing 3/4 sleeves. 
100% polyester.
Machine wash.

name: Cayman Agatha shirt dress
description:
ViX wave their exotic wand over the Agatha shirt dress and create this bold and vivacious suitcase essential. Throw on over a bikini for a beach-ready look or dress up with sky-high wedges for a relaxed evening under the palms. 
This royal blue and white tie-dye lightweight shirt dress is collarless with a V-neck and a buttoned centre-front fastening. 
The loose fitting dress has a drawstring self-tie waist panel and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
100% viscose.
Machine wash.

name: St Barths bikini briefs
description:
ViX adds a splash of colour to your swimwear collection with these St Barths bikini briefs. The flattering wide waistband will boost your beach confidence whilst bright florals make them a cheerful piece. Complete the look with the coordinating top for carefree days in the sun. 
These yellow and blue floral-print bikini briefs have a low-rise and a wide waistband with gold metal side embellishments.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: St Barts bandeau bikini top
description:
Living up to its namesake, this St Barts bandeau bikini top from ViX is loaded with exotic allure. The yellow and blue floral-print is accented with a gold metal centre detail. Team yours with the matching briefs for your next five star escapade. 
This yellow and blue floral-print bandeau bikini has moulded cups, a gold metal centre detail, an optional halterneck strap and a self tie back strap.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Havana bikini top
description:
It’s all about attention to detail with ViX pieces; this Havana bikini top has tan leather and gold hardware that compliments the crisp white hue. Add the matching briefs and pack in your suitcase for your next beach escapade. 
This white bikini top has soft padded triangle cups, a self tie back strap and a self tie halter-neck strap with tan leather and logo engraved gold metal strap details.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane. Lining: 92% polyamide, 8% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Havana bikini briefs
description:
It doesn’t get more chic than ViX swimwear; these Havana bikini briefs ensuring you make a serious style statement at your next 5-star retreat. 
These white bikini briefs have tan leather and gold metal logo engraved side details with a gold metal logo back detail.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane. Lining: 92% polyamide, 8% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Pippa broderie anglaise kaftan
description:
Channel the bohemian vibe of beachwear experts, ViX in this Pippa kaftan. A broderie anglaise detailing makes this a girlish piece, perfect with embellished sandals as a beach cover-up or a dress when exploring foreign towns. 
This white broderie anglaise kaftan has a V-neck with a rope necktie detail featuring yellow gold beaded tassel ends. 
The loose fitting kaftan has draped short sleeves and sides.
100% viscose.
Machine wash.

name: St Barth's Alexia maxi dress
description:
The ideal resort wardrobe calls for a glamorous cover-up like ViX’s St Barth’s Alexia dress. A blue and white floral-print is balanced by contrasting mosaic-print panels, whilst the adjustable straps ensure the most flattering fit. 
This yellow and blue floral-print sleeveless maxi dress has blue mosaic-print side panels with high side hem slits. 
The loose fitting dress has a scoop neck with adjustable skinny shoulder straps and a cross over back.
100% viscose.
Machine wash.

name: Alto floral-print dress
description:
Unabashed femininity courtesy of Vivienne Westwood Anglomania and her Alto dress. A gathered silhouette and English garden florals re-assert house signatures; make the best of both and team with classic courts and a black envelope clutch. 
This black, white, beige, yellow green and grey floral-print silk-blend dress a draped boat-neck with one capped sleeve and one sleeveless side. 
The dress fits slim over the body with ruched side seams and a hidden zip side fastening.
60% viscose, 40% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Bia bikini briefs
description:
ViX's Bia bikini briefs are a fabulous poolside option. Side embellishment adds a flash of metallic to a flattering piece. Team yours with the coordinating top for a chic summer look. 
These white bikini briefs have a low rise and a fold over waist band with gold metal and orange enamel side embellishments.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Sally chemise dress
description:
Let uncomplicated dressing accompany a relaxed holiday vibe with this ViX cover-up. Optic white allows your sun-kissed glow to do the talking, keeping this look fresh, versatile and beach-ready. 
This white linen-blend shirt dress has a V-neck, and back and a buttoned centre-front fastening. 
The loose fitting dress has a rounded hem and long sleeves which can be rolled and fastened with a buttoned strap detail.
85% linen, 15% rayon.
Machine wash.

name: Ivory tie briefs
description:
Accented with gold metal and ivory beads, these black bikini briefs from ViX epitomise glamorous poolside style. Pair yours with the matching bikini top on your next five star retreat. 
These black bikini briefs have a low rise with a Brazilian cut and self tie fastenings featuring gold metal and faux ivory beaded ends.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Shaman ruched jersey dress
description:
This Shaman jersey dress from Vivienne Westwood Anglomania is sure to get you noticed. A rich purple hue and carefully placed ruching make it a stunning after-dark option. Team yours with metallic heels for your next high profile event. 
This purple cotton-jersey dress has a boat-neck, 3/4 length sleeves and ruched side seams. 
The dress fits slim over the body and easily slips on.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Fitted sleeveless dress
description:
Understated in eccentricity, this Vivienne Westwood Anglomania dress is a sublime off-duty option. A celebration of the female form with an alluring silhouette and a mysterious quality. 
This black and navy blue plain check print sleeveless dress is fitted to the waist with a folded cowl neck and a square back.
The dress has a full skirt with off-centre pleats and has a hidden zip centre-back fastening.
72% acetate, 28% polyester. Combo: 65% polyester, 35% cotton.
Dry clean.
Country of Origin: Italy.

name: Purity draped neck T-shirt
description:
Vivienne Westwood Anglomania’s Purity draped neck T-shirt is a versatile piece. This rich purple style is sure to be your go-to thanks to flattering gathered seam detailing and a feminine neckline. Team it with jeans and heels for drinks with friends or a pencil skirt in the office.   
This purple jersey T-shirt has a draped cowl-neck, a gathered side hem detail and 3/4 length sleeves.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Halton Anglo 1970's print dress
description:
Exuding the signature cowl-neck of Vivienne Westwood Anglomania, this Halton Anglo dress is a 70’s-inspired dream. Monochrome print and a flattering silhouette give this piece a fearless stand-out quality. Make a statement with red shoes and a box clutch at your next event.  
This black and cream cotton sleeveless dress has a draped cowl-neck and can be worn off the shoulder with a hidden zip centre-back fastening. 
The dress is fitted to the waist with a full pleated skirt.
100% cotton. Combo: 65% polyester, 35% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Glitter jersey T-shirt
description:
Never one to keep things basic, Vivienne Westwood Anglomania takes a white tee concept and makes a statement. Glistening metallic fabric and figure-flattering draping give this piece a futuristic vibe that will add a new dimension to your wardrobe.  
This white and metallic silver jersey T-shirt has a boat neck, half sleeves and a diagonal front sash detail with ruched side seams.
94% acetate, 6% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Shaman ruched tunic top
description:
A fabulously rich hue makes this Vivienne Westwood Anglomania top a stand-out addition to your work to weekend wardrobe. Sensationally vivacious, this is the perfect piece to make an impact in.  
This fuchsia pink jersey T-shirt has a close-fitting boat neck, long sleeves and ruched pleated side seams. 
The top fits slim over the body and easily slips on.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Shu twist jersey dress
description:
Subtly enhancing an hourglass silhouette, Vivienne Westwood Anglomania reinvents the classic LBD. An intriguing slit reveals a flash of skin making this a sophisticated yet sultry work to off-duty piece. 
This black stretch-jersey dress has a boat-neck, half-sleeves and an off-centre long hem slit with a draped cross-over waist detail and a ruched seam down each side. 
The fitted dress easily slips on.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.
Country of origin: Italy.

name: Soma double-breasted peacoat
description:
Vivienne Westwood Anglomania reinvigorates the classic peacoat with this Soma design. The sophisticated double-breasted style features a tactile faux fur shawl collar and statement gold buttons. Style this wool-blend number with super-skinny jeans and chunky knit jumpers on wintery days. 
This black wool-blend peacoat has a large navy faux fur shawl collar, long sleeves, an elasticated back and two large front patch pockets with a double-breasted buttoned front fastening.
75% virgin wool, 25% polyamide. Combo: 70% moda acrylic, 30% cotton. Combo 2: 100% viscose. Combo 3: 65% polyester, 35% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Drape-front fitted dress
description:
Vivienne Westwood Anglomania’s royal-blue Drape front fitted dress brings a bright edge to elegant dressing. An asymmetric cut and off-centre back V bring recognisable traits to the silhouette, asking for little by way of accessories. 
This royal-blue crepe sleeveless dress has an A-symmetrical cowl-neck front draping and an off-centre V back neck. 
The fitted dress has a hidden side zip fastening and a fitted skirt with a side draping feature.
100% viscose.
Hand wash.

name: Card tie-waist crepe blouse
description:
Cut from a lightweight crepe, this Vivienne Westwood Anglomania’s blouse drapes beautifully over the body. Its invigorating red hue will liven up any outfit. Team it with a black skirt and metallic heels. 
This red crepe blouse has a boat-neck and capped sleeves with a pleated shoulder detail.
The loose fitting blouse has a self-fastening waist tie and a concealed side zip fastening.
100% viscose.
Dry clean.

name: Fitted drape front blouse
description:
Avant-garde silhouettes are a Vivienne Westwood Anglomania forte, this fitted drape front blouse ultimately celebrating the female form with a peplum waist and sensual off the shoulder neck detailing. 
This fuchsia-pink sleeveless blouse has a draped low cowl-neck, a zipped centre back fastening and a peplum hem panel.
100% cotton. Combo: 65% polyester, 35% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Shaman ruched jersey dress
description:
A distinct yet demure piece from Vivienne Westwood Anglomania, this richly coloured dress is an imperative addition to any Spring wardrobe. Gorgeous for warm-weather jaunts, this is a relaxed way to stay on top of style this season. 
This fuchsia-pink stretch-jersey dress has a slash-neck, one sleeveless arm and one capped sleeves with a ruched waist and asymmetrical shoulder detail. 
The fitted dress easily slips on.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.
Country of origin: Italy.

name: Utah glitter drape dress
description:
With a hint of sparkle and typically avant-garde twists and drapes, this Utah dress from Vivienne Westwood Anglomania takes a punk-rock approach to evening dressing. 
This black glitter stretch-jersey dress has a cowl-neck, capped sleeves and a draped front detail. 
The slip on fitted dress is ankle length with an uneven hem. 
94% acetate, 6% elastane.
Hand wash.
Country of origin: Italy.

name: Shaman ruched jersey dress
description:
Channel the distinctive features of Vivienne Westwood Anglomania in this Shaman jersey dress. A bold red hue and artfully ruched silhouette make it a fabulous stand-alone piece. Wear yours with metallic shoes for a modern evening look. 
This red cotton-jersey dress has a boat-neck, 3/4 length sleeves and ruched side seams. 
The dress fits slim over the body and easily slips on.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Halton sea monster-print dress
description:
The Halton sea monster-print dress is an insight into the unique mind of Vivienne Westwood Anglomania. Updating the label’s signature tartan with playful stamps and a B-movie monster – it’s a kitsch, yet utterly wearable option for a summer garden party. 
This cotton sleeveless dress has a multi-coloured tartan and sea-monster print with a fitted top, a draped cowl neck and a square back. 
The dress has a hidden zip centre back fastening and a full pleated skirt.
100% cotton. 2nd fabric: 65% polyester, 35% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Wool pencil skirt
description:
Vivienne Westwood Anglomania moves away from statement prints with this wool-blend skirt – a wardrobe staple with edge thanks to two side hem slits. Style it with a voluminous blouse to make the most of its figure-hugging silhouette. 
This black wool blend pencil skirt has side hem slits and a top button and hidden zip side fastening.
53% polyester, 43% wool, 4% elastane.
Machine wash.

name: Melita drape front jersey dress
description:
This purple stretch-jersey dress from Vivienne Westwood Anglomania is a round-the-clock way to wear the label’s signature draped styles. Pair it with black pumps by day and strappy sandals by night.    
This purple jersey dress has a fitted top with a cowl neck and 3/4 length sleeves.
The dress has a draped slim skirt with a gathered side seam and an a-symmetric hem.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Shaman asymmetric draped dress
description:
Vivienne Westwood Anglomania takes all the work out of mix-and-match prints with the Shaman dress. Constructed from a cleverly-draped stretch silk – this style skims your shape without being too clingy. Anchor the dramatic pattern with black pumps and a matching clutch. 
This black, red, blue and purple multi cracking wall print silk blend dress has one sleeveless side and one 1/2 sleeve with a draped cowl neck.
The dress has a draped skirt with gathered sides and an asymmetric hem.
60% viscose, 40% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Aztec-print full skirt
description:
For a statement skirt, look no further than this Vivienne Westwood Anglomania style, whose full silhouette and clashing prints will instantly get you noticed. Highlight the waist with a cropped top or a classic black blouse. 
A black, blue, yellow and purple multi cracking-print has a magenta-pink polka-dot secondary print. 
The skirt has hidden side pockets and an Asymmetric hem.
100% cotton.
Dry clean.

name: Aztec full skirt dress
description:
This silk-blend Aztec dress features a striking mash-up of graphic prints. It’s cut into a classic A-line silhouette, with an asymmetric hemline that’s undeniably Vivienne Westwood Anglomania. Pick out the print’s colours with heels in fuchsia or mauve. 
This black, blue, red, pink and purple multi cracking print silk blend sleeveless dress has a fitted top with a cowl neck and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
The dress has a full A-line skirt with hidden side pockets and longer sides.
Each dress is unique and will vary slightly due to the nature of the printed fabric. 
60% viscose, 40% silk.
Dry clean.

name: Gaia check wool cape
description:
Punkish style is Vivienne Westwood Anglomania’s forte, and this Gaia wool cape is a cool way to tap into the trend. With its dark checks and artful draping, shrug it on over sophisticated tailoring for an eclectic finish. 
This charcoal grey and mid-grey check wool-blend cape has a wide funnel-neck with one capped sleeve and one wide wrist length sleeve.
The slip-on asymmetric cape drapes longer at each side.
80% wool, 20% polyamide.
Dry clean.

name: Pax cowl-neck T-shirt
description:
Instantly recognisable as Vivienne Westwood Anglomania, this Pax T-shirt features a draped cowl-neck and a flattering gathered side. Wear it round-the-clock with a chic pencil skirt and buckled heels. 
This plum purple jersey T-shirt has a draped cowl-neck, a gathered side hem detail and 3/4 length sleeves.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Melita drape front jersey dress
description:
Flattering side ruching and a fitted silhouette make this Melita dress a signature Vivienne Westwood Anglomania design. Amp it up with striped pumps and a small box clutch. 
This black jersey dress has a fitted top with a cowl neck and 3/4 length sleeves.
The dress has a draped slim skirt with a gathered side seam and an a-symmetric hem.
95% viscose, 5% lycra.
Hand wash.

name: Aztec lurex full skirt
description:
Holographic fabrics have been buzzing around for several seasons. Vivienne Westwood Anglomania interprets the trend in dramatic style with this draped knee-length skirt – designed to sit high at the waist and catch the light as you move. 
This holographic silver knee-length skirt is draped from the waist band with an asymmetric hem.
The skirt has hidden side-pockets and a top button and hidden zip centre back fastening.
54% polyester, 26% acetate, 21% metallic.
Machine wash.

name: St Martin bikini top
description:
This St Martin bikini top from ViX exudes poolside glamour. The multicoloured pattern and leather and gold beaded embellishments bring an exotic touch to the triangle cups. Team yours with the matching briefs on your next getaway. 
This multicoloured St Martin-print bikini top has lightly padded triangle cups, a self tie back strap and a cream rope self tie halterneck strap with a brown leather and gold beaded embellishment detail.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane. Lining: 92% polyamide, 8% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Aztec drape-shoulder lurex dress
description:
Go for all out glitz this season with Vivienne Westwood Anglomania’s silver dress. Its mirror-shine finish and figure-flattering A-line silhouette make it perfect for the party circuit. Black pumps and a metallic clutch will finish the look nicely. 
This holographic-silver sleeveless dress has a fitted top with a pleated shoulder detail and a hidden zip centre back fastening.
The dress is fitted to the waist with a full A-line knee-length skirt.
54% polyester, 25% acetate, 21% polyester.
Dry clean.

name: Solid faux leather and canvas detail bikini briefs
description:
Spliced with brown faux leather and gold metal hardware, these white bikini briefs are perfect for your next exotic retreat. Style them with the coordinating top for a flawless poolside look. 
These white bikini briefs have a low-rise and a Brazillian cut with brown faux leather and beige canvas side details featuring gold metal hardware.
84.9% polyester, 15.1% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Titan silk blouse
description:
This party season is all about statement separates, so work the trend in this black silk Titan blouse from Vivienne Westwood Anglomania. Puffed shoulders and a draped neck bring a dramatic edge to its classic silhouette. Wear yours with a metallic skirt and sky-high heels. 
This black silk blouse has a draped boat neck and 3/4 length sleeves with puff shoulders and shoulder slit details.
The blouse has a rounded hem and slips-on easily.
100% silk.
Dry clean.

name: St Martin full bikini briefs
description:
Make a chic impression on the beach in these St Martin bikini briefs from swimwear experts ViX. Rope side fastenings add a bohemian twist to a vibrant pattern. Complete the look with the matching top for head to toe impact. 
These multicoloured St Martin print bikini briefs have cream rope self tie side fastenings with brown leather tassels and gold metal bead details.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane. Lining: 92% polyamide, 8% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Solid faux leather and canvas trimmed bikini top
description:
For exotic resortwear we look to ViX, whose Bia halter bikini top is guaranteed to make a statement. Spliced with faux leather, canvas and gold metal hardware, team yours with the coordinating bottoms for a flawless finish.  
This white halter-neck bikini has lightly padded triangle cups, a self tie back strap and a self tie halter-neck strap with brown faux leather and beige canvas details featuring gold metal hardware.
84.9% polyamide, 15.1% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Ivory triangle bikini top
description:
ViX transforms the classic black bikini top with this Ivory style. Finished with a subtle gold metal detail and self tie fastening straps, this triangle design is perfect for all your exotic escapades. Add the matching briefs for luxurious beach style. 
This black triangle bikini top has lightly padded cups, an ivory and gold metal embellished centre detail and self tie fastening halter-neck and back straps.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Jaguar print bikini top
description:
ViX’s jaguar print bikini top is lightly padded and features gold-metal accents at the neckline. Team yours with the matching briefs and oversized frames.
This black and white jaguar-print bikini top has lightly-padded triangle cups and a self fastening halter-neck strap featuring a gold metal slinky chain detail.
The bikini top has a self-fastening back strap with logo engraved gold metal toggle ends. 
80% polyamide, 15% elastane. Lining: 75% polyamide, 25% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Jaguar-print bikini briefs
description:
For a more exotic take on swimwear, opt for these jaguar-print bikini briefs from ViX. The Brazilian cut and gold metal slinky chain details will look great against sun-kissed skin.
These black and white jaguar-print bikini briefs have a low-rise, a Brazilian cut and feature a gold metal slinky chain detail on each side. 
The bikini briefs have a ruched centre-back seam with a gold metal logo disc detail. 
85% polyamide, 15% elastane. Lining: 75% polyamide, 25% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Nepal broderie anglaise kaftan
description:
ViX is our go-to for holiday essentials with a boho-luxe edge. This Nepal broderie anglaise kaftan is a chic jet-setting piece. Throw it on over your bikini in the midday sun, adding espadrilles and a wide-brimmed hat come cocktail hour.  
This white cotton kaftan has a V-neck with a broderie anglaise panel and short winged sleeves featuring broderie anglaise edges.
The loose fitting kaftan easily slips on.
100% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Amazonia-print bikini top
description:
Printed with a tonal green Amazonia pattern, this triangle bikini top from ViX will bring a sense of the exotic to your swimwear collection. Self-tie fastenings and softly padded cups make it easy to adjust and mould to your shape. Wear yours with the matching briefs as you head to the beach.     
This tonal green Amazonia-print halterneck bikini has lightly padded triangle cups, a self tie back strap and a self tie halterneck strap with gold metal hardware.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane. 
Hand wash.

name: Amazonia-print bikini briefs
description:
These bikini briefs from ViX are printed with an Amazon rainforest-inspired print. Spliced with gold metal embellishments on either side, they’ll bring a touch of exotic glamour to your swimwear collection. 
These tonal green Amazonia-print bikini briefs have a low rise and a ruched back detail with gold metal a side embellishment on either side.
84% polyamide, 16% elastane.
Hand wash.

name: Patchwork fur jacket
description:
Versus electric-blue patchwork fox fur jacket is lined in the brand’s signature print and comes with a gold pin featuring the iconic Versace Medusa logo. Pare it down with boyfriend jeans and heels for the ultimate style statement.
This electric-blue and peacock-green patchwork fox-fur jacket is collarless, has a round-neck and a concealed centre-front hook fastening.
The loose fitting jacket has side pockets and long sleeves with a signature designer print lining.
The jacket comes with a gold pin featuring the iconic Versace logo.
100% fox. Lining: 96% polyester, 4% elastane.
Specialist fur clean.

name: Ticino jacket
description:
Weekend by MaxMara brings a graphic accent to your office to off-duty wardrobe with this Ticino jacket. A classic silhouette gets a directional makeover thanks to cream and black stripes, making it a lively accompaniment to smart black trousers. 
This cream and black stripe heavy-jersey jacket has notch lapels and a two button centre-front fastening. 
The fitted jacket has flapped front pockets and long sleeves.
47% cotton, 45% polyester, 7% polyamide, 1% elastane. Lining: 100% acetate.
Dry clean.

name: Floc trousers
description:
Complete your boardroom to bar repertoire with these Floc trousers from Weekend by MaxMara. Crafted from comfortable cotton-blend fabric and cut for an on-trend straight-leg fit, this flattering pair will work best with sky-scraper heels and a tailored jacket. 
These black cotton-blend tailored trousers have a straight-leg and a mid-rise with a top hook and zipped front fastening. 
The trousers have buttoned back jet pockets and belt loops.
47% cotton, 47% viscose, 6% elastane.
Dry clean.

name: Eusebio sweater
description:
Weekend by MaxMara’s Eusebio sweater is an luxurious new season separate. Crafted from a soft silk-cotton blend in a wear-anywhere hue, this delicate piece is the perfect partner to a bold statement skirt and soaring heels. 
This silk-cotton knit sweater has a boat-neck and capped sleeves. 
55% silk, 45% cotton.
Hand wash.

name: Delia coat
description:
Weekend by MaxMara give outerwear a fresh update with this funnel-neck, short sleeved Delia coat. A classic camel colour and wool-blend makes it a versatile everyday investment. Wear yours for work or play as a stylish way to stay warm. 
This camel-brown wool coat has a funnel-neck and a buttoned centre-front fastening. 
The loose fitting coat has short sleeves and front patch pockets.
90% wool, 10% polyamide.
Dry clean.

name: Bia halter bikini top
description:
Finished with luxe 24ct yellow gold-plated accents, this Bia halter bikini top from ViX is guaranteed to turn heads poolside. Self-tie fastening straps and light moulded padding ensure optimum comfort and versatility. Team yours with the matching briefs on your next exotic retreat.
